ACEETBL.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
ACEETBL  CSECT
ACEETBL  AMODE 31
ACEETBL  RMODE ANY
         DC    CL8'ACEE    '             CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         DC    CL40'Accessor environment element'
         DC    CL8'STORCB'               PANEL NAME
         FIELD BASE=ACEE
         FIELD ACEEACEE,C,4,'Eyecatcher'
         FIELD ACEESP,N,1,'Storage subpool'
         FIELD ACEELEN,X,3,'LENGTH (HEX)'
         FIELD ACEELEN,N,3,'LENGTH (decimal)'
         FIELD ACEEVRSN,X,1,'ACEE version'
         FIELD ACEEIEP,A,4,'For user use',                             +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEEINST,A,4,'User data from profile',                  +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEEUSRL,N,1,'User id length'
         FIELD ACEEUSRI,C,8,'User id'
         FIELD ACEEGRPL,N,1,'RACF group name length'
         FIELD ACEEGRPN,C,8,'RACF group name'
         FIELD ACEEFLG1,X,1,'Flags',                                   +
               BIT1=(ACEESPEC,'SPECIAL'),                              +
               BIT2=(ACEEADSP,'Automatic data security'),              +
               BIT3=(ACEEOPER,'OPERATIONS'),                           +
               BIT4=(ACEEAUDT,'AUDITOR'),                              +
               BIT5=(ACEELOGU,'Log RACF functions'),                   +
               BIT6=(ACEEPRIV,'STC with priviledged'),                 +
               BIT7=(ACEERACF,'RACF defined user')
         FIELD ACEEFLG2,X,1,'Flags',                                   +
               BIT1=(ACEEALTR,'ALTER authority to resource'),          +
               BIT2=(ACEECNTL,'CONTROL authority to resource'),        +
               BIT3=(ACEEUPDT,'UPDATE authority to resource'),         +
               BIT4=(ACEEREAD,'READ authority to resource'),           +
               BIT5=(ACEENONE,'No authority to resource')
         FIELD ACEEFLG3,X,1,'Flags',                                   +
               BIT1=(ACEEGRPA,'Access list contains group and USERID'),+
               BIT2=(ACEERASP,'RACF address space'),                   +
               BIT3=(ACEECLNT,'Unauthenticated client'),               +
               BIT4=(ACEEACLT,'Authenticated client'),                 +
               BIT5=(ACEETSKP,'Task level process'),                   +
               BIT6=(ACEEIUSP,'INITUSP has been done'),                +
               BIT7=(ACEEDUID,'Default UID being used'),               +
               BIT8=(ACEENPWR,'Password not required')
         FIELD ACEEDATE,X,3,'Date of RACINIT'
         FIELD ACEEPROC,C,8,'Name of started PROC'
         FIELD ACEETRMP,A,4,'Address of terminal id',                  +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEEFLG4,X,1,'Flags',                                   +
               BIT1=(ACEEUATH,'Authorized to define other users'),     +
               BIT2=(ACEEDASD,'Authorized to protect DASD volumes'),   +
               BIT3=(ACEETAPE,'Authorized to protect TAPE volumes'),   +
               BIT4=(ACEETERM,'Authorized to protect terminals')
         FIELD ACEEAPLV,X,1,'Application level (from APPL profile)'
         FIELD ACEETRLV,X,1,'Port of entry profile level'
         FIELD ACEETRDA,A,4,'Port of entry data address',              +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEETRID,C,8,'Terminal ID'
         FIELD ACEEAMP,A,4,'First anchored model'
         FIELD ACEECLTH,X,4,'User class authorizations'
         FIELD ACEECLCP,A,4,'In storage profile trees',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEEAPTR,A,4,'For application use',                     +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEEAPLN,C,8,'Application name'
         FIELD ACEEAPDA,A,4,'Application data address',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEEUNAM,A,4,'User name address',                       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEEMDLS,A,4,'Model name array address',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEEGATA,A,4,'Generic anchor table address',            +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEEFCGP,A,4,'List of groups address',                  +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEEDSLP,A,4,'List of user''s authorized catagories',   +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEEDAT4,X,4,'Date'
         FIELD ACEEPADS,A,4,'Datasets accessed by controlled programs',+
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEESLVL,X,1,'Maximum security level accessible'
         FIELD ACEEFLG5,X,1,'Flags',                                   +
               BIT1=(ACEEMODE,'31 bit mode'),                          +
               BIT2=(ACEEVMSK,'ACEEPLCL is 1024 bits'),                +
               BIT3=(ACEED4OK,'ACEEDAT4 is valid'),                    +
               BIT4=(ACEEXNVR,'ENVR object created by other system'),  +
               BIT5=(ACEESTOK,'SERVAUTH resource no longer available'),+
               BIT6=(ACEENSTE,'ENVR object should be used in FASTAUTH')
         FIELD ACEEFLG6,X,1,'Flags',                                   +
               BIT1=(ACEERAUI,'Restricted access user'),               +
               BIT2=(ACEERUAA,'UNIX file access controlled by OTHER'), +
               BIT3=(ACEERUAV,'RESTRICTED.FILESYS.ACCESS checked')
         FIELD ACEE3PTY,A,4,'ACEE created by 3rd party RACHECK',       +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=ACEETBL
         FIELD ACEEPLCL,A,4,'Extended class authorization mask addr',  +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEESUID,C,8,'Surrogate user id (AUDIT)'
         FIELD ACEEOCOX,A,4,'ACEX address',                            +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEEPTDS,A,4,'First TDS table address',                 +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEEX5PR,A,4,'X500 name structure address',             +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEETOKP,A,4,'UTOKEN address',                          +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEESRVA,A,4,'SERVAUTH resource name address',          +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEESRVP,A,4,'SERVAUTH profile name',                   +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEENSTA,A,4,'ENVR that created this ACEE''s addr',     +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ACEEICTX,A,4,'Identity context extension (ICTX)',       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         DC    X'FF'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         IHAACEE
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     REGEQU
         END      ACEETBL

ASCBTBL.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
ASCBTBL  CSECT
ASCBTBL  AMODE 31
ASCBTBL  RMODE ANY
         DC    CL8'ASCB    '             CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         DC    CL40'Address space control block'
         DC    CL8'STORCB'               PANEL NAME
         FIELD BASE=ASCB
         FIELD ASCBASCB,C,4,'Eyecatcher'
         FIELD ASCBFWDP,A,4,'Next ASCB on ASCB READY queue',           +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=ASCBTBL
         FIELD ASCBBWDP,A,4,'Previous ASCB on ASCB READY queue',       +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=ASCBTBL
         FIELD ASCBLTCS,A,4,'TCB/SRB local lock suspend queue',        +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBSVRB,A,4,'SVRB pool',                               +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBSYNC,N,4,'Counter to synchronize SVRB pool'
         FIELD ASCBIOSP,A,4,'IOS purge interface control block (IPIB)',+
               PNS=STORSTOR  (Mapped by IECDIPIB)
         FIELD ASCBWQID,X,2,'CPU holding web queue lock'
         FIELD ASCBASID,X,2,'Address space ID'
         FIELD ASCBSRMFlags,X,1,'SRM flags',                           +
               BIT1=(ASCBVCMOverRide,'Non standard SRM management'),   +
               BIT2=(ASCBBrokenUP,'Address space broken up by SRM'),   +
               BIT3=(ASCBVCMGivePreemption,'Full preemption'),         +
               BIT4=(ASCBVCMGiveSigpAny,'May SIGP any CPU')
         FIELD ASCBLL5,X,1,'Flags',                                    +
               BIT1=(ASCBS3S,'RQE or IQE scheduled (stage effector)')
         FIELD ASCBHLHI,X,1,'Suspend locks held at task suspension'
         FIELD ASCBDP,X,2,'Dispatch priority'
         FIELD ASCBTCBE,N,4,'Ready TCBs in an enclave'
         FIELD ASCBLDA,A,4,'Local VSM data area (in LSQA)',            +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBRSMF,X,1,'RSM flags',                               +
               BIT1=(ASCB2LPU,'Second level preferred user'),          +
               BIT2=(ASCB1LPU,'First level preferred user'),           +
               BIT3=(ASCBN2LP,'SRM TRANSWAP should not set ASCB2LPU'), +
               BIT4=(ASCBVEQR,'V=R address space')
         FIELD ASCBFLG3,X,1,'Flags',                                   +
               BIT1=(ASCBCNIP,'Address space created by NIP'),         +
               BIT2=(ASCBREUS,'Reusable address space ID')
         FIELD ASCBCSCB,A,4,'CSCB address',                            +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBTSB,A,4,'TSB address',                              +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBJSTL,T,4,'Job step time limit'
         FIELD ASCBECB,A,4,'RCT work ECB'
         FIELD ASCBUBET,X,4,'Time stamp when user becomes ready'
         FIELD ASCBTLCH,A,4,'Chain to time limit exceeded queue',      +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBDUMP,A,4,'Dump task TCB address',                   +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=TCBTBL
         FIELD ASCBAFFN,X,2,'CPU affinity indicator'
         FIELD ASCBRCTF,X,1,'RCT flags',                               +
               BIT1=(ASCBTMNO,'Quiesced, Quiescing, or restoring'),    +
               BIT2=(ASCBFRS,'Restore request'),                       +
               BIT3=(ASCBFQU,'Quiesce request'),                       +
               BIT4=(ASCBJSTE,'Job step time exceeded'),               +
               BIT5=(ASCBWAIT,'Long WAIT'),                            +
               BIT6=(ASCBOUT,'Swapped out'),                           +
               BIT7=(ASCBTMLW,'Long WAIT'),                            +
               BIT8=(ASCBTOFF,'No job step timing')
         FIELD ASCBFLG1,X,1,'Flags',                                   +
               BIT1=(ASCBLSAS,'Logically swapped out'),                +
               BIT2=(ASCBDSTK,'Time stamp required for long WAIT'),    +
               BIT3=(ASCBDSTZ,'Bit position for ASCBDSTK'),            +
               BIT4=(ASCBTERM,'Terminating normally'),                 +
               BIT5=(ASCBABNT,'Terminating abnormally'),               +
               BIT6=(ASCBMEMP,'Termination PURGEDQ indicator')
         FIELD ASCBTMCH,A,4,'Termination queue chain',                 +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBASXB,A,4,'ASXB address',                            +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=ASXBTBL
         FIELD ASCBSWCT,N,2,'Number of times in short WAIT'
         FIELD ASCBDSP1,X,1,'Nondispatchability flags',                +
               BIT1=(ASCBSSND,'System nondispatchable'),               +
               BIT2=(ASCBFAIL,'Failure occurred in address space'),    +
               BIT3=(ASCBSNQS,'Status stop non-quiescable SRBs'),      +
               BIT4=(ASCBSSSS,'Status stop SRB summary'),              +
               BIT5=(ASCBSTND,'TCBs nondispatchable'),                 +
               BIT6=(ASCBUWND,'Status set unlocked workunits'),        +
               BIT7=(ASCBNOQ,'Not on SWAPPED IN queue')
         FIELD ASCBFLG2,X,1,'Flags',                                   +
               BIT1=(ASCBXMPT,'Exempt from system nondispatchable'),   +
               BIT2=(ASCBPXMT,'Permanently exempt from nondispatch'),  +
               BIT3=(ASCBCEXT,'Cancel timer extension (EOT started'),  +
               BIT4=(ASCBS2s,'Stage II with out stage III effector'),  +
               BIT5=(ASCBNCML,'Not eligible for CML lock'),            +
               BIT6=(ASCBNOMT,'Must not be MEMTERMed'),                +
               BIT7=(ASCBNOMD,'Must not be MEMTERMed on DAT errors')
         FIELD ASCBSRBS,N,2,'Nbr of suspended SRBs'
         FIELD ASCBLLWQ,A,4,'Local lock suspend service web queue',    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBRCTP,A,4,'Region control task (RCT) TCB address',   +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=TCBTBL
         FIELD ASCBLOCK,X,2,'Local lock'
         FIELD ASCBLSWQ,A,4,'Local lock web suspend queue addr',       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBLSWQ,A,4,'Local lock web suspend queue addr',       +
               BIT1=(ASCBS3NL,'Local lock need by Stage III effector'),+
               BIT2=(ASCBLTCL,'Local lock need by a TCB or SRB'),     ,+
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBQECB,X,4,'Quiesce ECB'
         FIELD ASCBMECB,X,4,'Memory create/delete ECB'
         FIELD ASCBOUCB,A,4,'OUCB address',                            +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=OUCBTBL
         FIELD ASCBOUXB,A,4,'OUXB address',                            +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=OUXBTBL
         FIELD ASCBLEVL,X,1,'ASCB level',                              +
               VALUE1=(ASCBVS00,'HBB2102'),                            +
               VALUE2=(ASCBVS01,'JBB2110'),                            +
               VALUE3=(ASCBVS02,'JBB2133'),                            +
               VALUE4=(ASCBVS03,'HBB4410')
         FIELD ASCBFL2A,X,1,'Flags',                                   +
               VALUE1=(ASCBNOPR,'Do not SIGP to execute work')
         FIELD ASCBIQEA,A,4,'ATCAM IQE address',                       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBRTMC,A,4,'SDWA SQA queue',                          +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBMCC,X,4,'Abend completion code'
         FIELD ASCBJBNI,A,4,'Job name address (STC''s)',               +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBJBNS,A,4,'Job name address (Start, Mount, Logon)',  +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBSRQ1,X,1,'Dispatcher serialization flags 1',        +
               BIT1=(ASCBDSG4,'Signal WAITing when intersect reset'),  +
               BIT2=(ASCBDFLT,'Default local intersect')
         FIELD ASCBSRQ2,X,1,'Dispatcher serialization flags 2',        +
               BIT1=(ASCBDSG3,'Signal WAITing when intersect reset'),  +
               BIT2=(ASCBSRM1,'SRM intersecting'),                     +
               BIT3=(ASCBQVER,'Queue verification intersecting')
         FIELD ASCBSRQ3,X,1,'Dispatcher serialization flags 3',        +
               BIT1=(ASCBDSG2,'Signal WAITing when intersect reset'),  +
               BIT2=(ASCBRCTI,'Region control task intersecting'),     +
               BIT3=(ASCBTCBV,'TCB verification intersecting'),        +
               BIT4=(ASCBACHA,'ASCB CHAP intersecting'),               +
               BIT5=(ASCBMTER,'Memory termination intersecting'),      +
               BIT6=(ASCBMINI,'Memory initialization intersecting'),   +
               BIT7=(ASCBCBVE,'Control block verification intersect')
         FIELD ASCBSRQ4,X,1,'Dispatcher serialization flags 4',        +
               BIT1=(ASCBDSG1,'Signal WAITing when intersect reset'),  +
               BIT2=(ASCBDETA,'Detach intersecting'),                  +
               BIT3=(ASCBATTA,'Attach intersecting'),                  +
               BIT4=(ASCBRTM2,'RTM2 intersecting'),                    +
               BIT5=(ASCBRTM1,'RTM1 intersecting'),                    +
               BIT6=(ASCBCHAP,'CHAP intersecting'),                    +
               BIT7=(ASCBSTAT,'Status intersecting'),                  +
               BIT8=(ASCBPURD,'PURGEQ intersecting')
         FIELD ASCBVGTT,A,4,'Global VTAM termination table (GVTT)',    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBPCTT,A,4,'Private catalog termination table (PCTT)',+
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBSSRB,N,2,'Number of status stop SRBs'
         FIELD ASCBSMCT,N,1,'Number of must complete requests'
         FIELD ASCBSWTL,T,4,'Step WAIT time limit'
         FIELD ASCBSRBT+4,N,4,'Accumulated SRB time'
         FIELD ASCBLTCB,A,4,'Local lock suspend queue',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBLTCN,N,4,'Number of requestors needing local lock'
         FIELD ASCBTCBS,N,4,'Number of READY TCBs'
         FIELD ASCBLSQT,N,4,'Number of TCBs on local lock suspend Q'
         FIELD ASCBWPRB,A,4,'WAIT/POST request block',                 +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBNDP,N,1,'New dispatching priority'
         FIELD ASCBTNDP,N,1,'New time slice dispatching priority'
         FIELD ASCBNTSG,N,1,'New time slice group'
         FIELD ASCBIODP,N,1,'I/O dispatching priority'
         FIELD ASCBLOCI,A,4,'ASCB holding CML lock',                   +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=ASCBTBL
         FIELD ASCBCMLW,A,4,'Work unit holding CML or local lock',     +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBCMLC,N,4,'Number of CML locks held'
         FIELD ASCBSSO1,X,3,'Space switch event mask bytes 1-3'
         FIELD ASCBSSO4,X,1,'Mask byte 4',                             +
               BIT1=(ASCBSSSP,'SLIP/PER notify on space switch event'),+
               BIT2=(ASCBSSJS,'Job step termination on switch event')
         FIELD ASCBASTE,A,4,'Address space second table entry',        +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBLTOV,A,4,'Address of linkage table (LSQA)'
         FIELD ASCBATOV,A,4,'Address of (PC) auth table'
         FIELD ASCBETC,N,2,'Number of PCAUTH entries owned'
         FIELD ASCBETCN,N,2,'Number of PCAUTH connections to this A/S'
         FIELD ASCBLXR,N,2,'Number of link indexes (LX) reserved'
         FIELD ASCBAXR,N,2,'Nbr of authorization indexes (AX) reserved'
         FIELD ASCBSTKH,A,4,'Stack pool header for PCLINK serivce',    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBXTCB,A,4,'TCB that owns cross memory resources',    +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=TCBTBL
         FIELD ASCBCS1,X,1,'Compare and swap flags',                   +
               BIT1=(ASCBXMET,'Non reusable (has XMEM connections)'),  +
               BIT2=(ASCBXMEC,'XMEM entry tables exist'),              +
               BIT3=(ASCBXMPA,'Permanently not reusable'),             +
               BIT4=(ASCBXMLK,'Permanently not reusable (CML bind)'),  +
               BIT5=(ASCBPERS,'SLIP will activate PER for XMEM'),      +
               BIT6=(ASCBDTER,'A DAT error has occurred'),             +
               BIT7=(ASCBPERO,'PER on SWAP IN'),                       +
               BIT8=(ASCBSWOP,'Swapped out with respect to PER')
         FIELD ASCBCS2,X,1,'Compare and swap flags',                   +
               BIT1=(ASCBSAS,'Storage alteration (PER) is on'),        +
               BIT2=(ASCBSMGR,'Session manager in use'),               +
               BIT3=(ASCBDTIN,'SPF in use'),                           +
               BIT4=(ASCBXMNR,'Permanently not reusable (system LX)')
         FIELD ASCBGXL,A,4,'Globally loaded module extent info block', +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBLL1,X,1,'Flag byte 1',                              +
               BIT1=(ASCBSSPC,'Stop tasks pending CML lock release')
         FIELD ASCBLL2,X,1,'Flag byte 2'
         FIELD ASCBLL3,X,1,'Flag byte 3'
         FIELD ASCBLL4,X,1,'Flag byte 4',                              +
               BIT1=(ASCBTYP1,'Type 1 SVC in control')
         FIELD ASCBRCMS,A,4,'Address of lock local lock holder WAIT',  +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBIOSC,N,4,'I/O service units'
         FIELD ASCBPKML,X,2,'Protect key of last task dispatched'
         FIELD ASCBXCNT,N,2,'Number of I/Os'
         FIELD ASCBNSQA,A,4,'SQA resident NSSA chain',                 +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBASM,A,4,'ASM header addr',                          +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBASSB,A,4,'ASSB address',                            +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBTCME,A,4,'TCXTB (TCAM) address',                    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBGQIR,A,4,'GQSCAN information',                      +
               BIT1=(ASCBGQAB,'ISGQSCAN abended')
         FIELD ASCBGQI3,X,1,'Byte 4 of ASCBGQIR',                      +
               BIT1=(ASCBGQDS,'ISGQSCAN disabled')
         FIELD ASCBLSQE,N,4,'Enclave TCBs on local lock suspend queue'
         FIELD ASCBLSQE,N,4,'Enclave TCBs on local lock suspend queue'
         FIELD ASCBRSME,A,4,'RSM ASCB extension',                      +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBAVM1,X,1,'Availability manager flag byte 1'
         FIELD ASCBAVM2,X,1,'Availability manager flag byte 2'
         FIELD ASCBAGEN,N,2,'AVM ASID reuse generation number'
         FIELD ASCBARC,X,4,'Reason code for MEMTERM'
         FIELD ASCBRSMA,A,4,'RSM header address',                      +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASCBDCTI,N,4,'Channel connect time'
         DC    X'FF'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         IBMMAC   ASCB=LIST
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     REGEQU
         END      ASCBTBL

ASSBTBL.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
ASSBTBL  CSECT
ASSBTBL  AMODE 31
ASSBTBL  RMODE ANY
         DC    CL8'ASSB    '             CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         DC    CL40'Address space secondary block'
         DC    CL8'STORCB'               PANEL NAME
         FIELD BASE=ASSB
         FIELD ASSBASSB,C,4,'ASSB eyecatcher'
         FIELD ASSBXMF1,X,1,'Cross memory flags',                      +
               BIT1=(ASSBXEAX,'Non-zero index entries exist')
         FIELD ASSBXMF2,X,1,'Cross memory flags'
         FIELD ASSBXMCC,N,2,'Cross memory connections'
         FIELD ASSBCBTP,A,4,'ACBT address',                            +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBVSC,N,4,'VIO slots allocated'
         FIELD ASSBNVSC,N,4,'NON-VIO slots allocated'
         FIELD ASSBASRR,N,4,'Address space re-reads for SMF 30 record'
         FIELD ASSBDEXP,A,4,'DEXP address',                            +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBSTKN,X,8,'STOKEN'
         FIELD ASSBBPSA,A,4,'IBMPM anchor block',                      +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBCSCT,N,4,'Caching facility stops'
         FIELD ASSBBALV,A,4,'Virtual address of basic access list',    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBBALD,X,4,'Basic access list designator'
         FIELD ASSBXMSE,A,4,'XMSE',                                    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBTSQN,X,4,'Next TTOKEN sequence number'
         FIELD ASSBVCNT,N,4,'Tasks with vector affinity'
         FIELD ASSBPALV,A,4,'PASN access list',                        +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBASEI,A,4,'Address space related information',       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBRMA,A,4,'Resource manager control structure',       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBHST,X,8,'HIPERSPACE RSM service time'
         FIELD ASSBIIPT,X,8,'IOS I/O interrupt processing time'
         FIELD ASSBANEC,N,4,'ALESERV ADDs with no EAXs'
         FIELD ASSBSDOV,A,4,'Shared data object manager vector table', +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBMCSO,N,4,'Console IDs activated'
         FIELD ASSBDFAS,A,4,'DFP=SMSX structure',                      +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBFLG0,X,1,'Flag byte 0',                             +
               BIT1=(ASSBBSDN,'Bypass SVCDUMP non-dispatchability'),   +
               BIT2=(ASSBCDSI,'CDSI resources held'),                  +
               BIT3=(ASSBPSCH,'Parallel DETACH scheduled')
         FIELD ASSBFLG1,X,1,'Flag byte 1',                             +
               BIT1=(ASSBNTAR,'NAME/TOKEN address space'),             +
               BIT2=(ASSBNTTR,'NAME/TOKEN JOB step task'),             +
               BIT3=(ASSBNTSL,'System level NAME/TOKEN pairs created'),+
               BIT4=(ASSBFRST,'First pool of SVRB''s obtained')
         FIELD ASSBFLG2,X,1,'Flag byte 2',                             +
               BIT1=(ASSBENFL,'ENF listen issued'),                    +
               BIT2=(ASSBNSWF,'WEB on TAWQ not flagged SWAP')
         FIELD ASSBFLG3,X,1,'Flag byte 3',                             +
               BIT1=(ASSBARM,'Registered with Automatic Restart'),     +
               BIT2=(ASSBNRST,'ARM should not restart this JOB'),      +
               BIT3=(ASSBGDPS,'This is the GDPS address space'),       +
               BIT4=(ASSBMDIP,'MEMTERM dump in progress')
         FIELD ASSBASCB,A,4,'ASCB',                                    +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=ASCBTBL
         FIELD ASSBASRF,A,4,'ASSB forward pointer',                    +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=ASSBTBL
         FIELD ASSBASRB,A,4,'ASSB backward pointer',                   +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=ASSBTBL
         FIELD ASSBSSD,A,4,'Suspended SRB descriptor queue',           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBMQMA,A,4,'MQM anchor',                              +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBLASB,X,8,'MVS/APPC token'
         FIELD ASSBSCH,A,4,'APPC scheduler ASCB',                      +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=ASCBTBL
         FIELD ASSBFSC,N,4,'Accumulated by IEAMFCNT'
         FIELD ASSBJSAB,A,4,'JOB scheduler ASCB',                      +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=ASCBTBL
         FIELD ASSBRCTW,A,4,'RCT''s WEB',                              +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBTLMI,A,4,'Tailored lock manager information block', +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBSDAS,A,4,'DUMP task working storage',               +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD ASSBTPIN,N,4,'UCB PINs outstanding'
         FIELD ASSBSPIN,N,4,'SRB mode UCB PINs outstanding'
         FIELD ASSBECT1,N,4,'Allocation requests bound on EDT1'
         FIELD ASSBECT2,N,4,'Allocation requests bound on EDT2'

BASEATBL.text:

* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
BASEATBL CSECT

         DC    CL8'BASEA'                CONTROL BLOCK NAME

         DC    CL8'STORCB'               PANEL NAME
         FIELD BASE=BASE

               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD BACBID,C,4,'Control block identifier'
         FIELD BASCPLID,X,4,'UTOKEN cell pool id'

         FIELD MSLOGSVC,N,4,'Number of executing WTL SVCs'
         FIELD BALOG,A,4,'Address of log control table',               +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD BAEBAPTR,A,4,'Extended scheduler resident area',        +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD BASDIPLD,X,2,'IPL device'
         FIELD BAPKES,X,2,'Initiator protect key mask'

               BIT1=(MSLOGENQ,'Log dataset queued to output writer'),  +
               BIT2=(MSLOGTHD,'Log not supported'),                    +
               BIT3=(MSLOGCOM,'Stop scheduling WTLs'),                 +
               BIT4=(MSLOGDAR,'Internal abend'),                       +
               BIT5=(MSLOGIPL,'First time entry switch'),              +
               BIT6=(MSLOGSTA,'STAE switch'),                          +
               BIT7=(MSLOGCHN,'Log chain manipulation error'),         +
               BIT8=(MSLOGTND,'Log task ended')

               BIT1=(BAMSSTAR,'STAR recursion'),                       +
               BIT2=(BAMASCH,'Master scheduler initialzation started'),+
               BIT3=(BAMSINIT,'Master scheduler initialized'),         +
               BIT4=(BAOKDUMP,'Dump during initialzation'),            +
               BIT5=(MSLOGCL,'Hardcopy turned off'),                   +
               BIT6=(MSLOGVH,'Hardcopy turned on')
         FIELD BALOGECB,X,4,'LOG ECB'
         FIELD BAMONITR,X,1,'Monitor flags',                           +
               BIT1=(BADSN,'DSNAMES are being monitored'),             +
               BIT2=(BASPACE,'Space is being monitored')
         FIELD BAMONTR2,X,1,'SETCON/monitor flags',                    +
               BIT1=(BASC_MN_JOBS,'JOBNAMES msgs enabled'),            +
               BIT2=(BASC_MN_JOBS_LOG,'JOBNAMES msgs logged'),         +
               BIT3=(BASC_MN_SESS,'SESSIONS msgs enabled'),            +
               BIT4=(BASC_MN_SESS_LOG,'SESSIONS msgs logged'),         +
               BIT5=(BASC_MN_STAT,'STATUS msgs enabled'),              +
               BIT6=(BASC_MN_STAT_LOG,'STATUS msgs logged')
         FIELD BACHFLGS,X,1,'CSCB flags',                              +
               BIT1=(BACSCBA,'CSCB above 16 meg line')
         FIELD BAMSIECB,X,4,'Master scheduler initialization ECB'
         FIELD BALOGCOM,A,4,'SYSLOG DEB table',                        +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD BASUBECB,X,4,'System serialization ECB'
         FIELD BAJNCNT,N,2,'Nbr of devices monitoring JOBNAMES'
         FIELD BASESCT,N,2,'Nbr of devices monitoring SESSIONS'
         FIELD BASTCNT,N,2,'Nbr of devices monitoring STATUS'
         FIELD MSSCHED,A,4,'NIP parameter list',                       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD MSSMFPRM,A,4,'SMF PARM member list',                    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD BAASCB,A,4,'Master scheduler ASCB',                     +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=ASCBTBL
         FIELD MSLOGCLS,C,1,'SYSLOG output class'
         FIELD MSLOGLMT,N,3,'WTLs in one log data set'
         FIELD MSLGCLOZ,X,4,'LOG termination ECB'
         FIELD MSLGWLOG,X,4,'LOG switch ECB'
         FIELD MSLGWTR,X,4,'WTL queue writer ECB'
         FIELD MSLGSTRT,X,4,'LOG reactivation ECB'

               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=JSCBTBL
         FIELD BASCTPTR,A,4,'Scheduled commands table',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD BACASTPT,A,4,'CAST address',                            +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD MSSSB,X,1,'Monitor time note byte'
         FIELD MSECBFL,X,1,'Master scheduler flags',                   +
               BIT1=(BAMSJOBS,'IEFJOBS DD present in master JCL'),     +
               BIT2=(MSWTL,'LOG abend resursion'),                     +
               BIT3=(MSSUMR,'MSSUM has been reset'),                   +
               BIT4=(MSSUM,'Summary bit. Vary UCB scan required')
         FIELD BAMTTBL,A,4,'Master trace table',                       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD BAMTRTN,A,4,'Master trace data entry routine',          +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD BAMTSP,N,1,'Master trace table subpool'
         FIELD BAMTLEN,N,3,'Master trace table size'
         FIELD BAMTCDR,A,4,'Master trace table change routine',        +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD BAMTDTAB,A,4,'Table dumped by trace recovery',          +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD BAMTDTSP,N,1,'Subpool of table dumped by trace recovery'
         FIELD BAMTDTLN,N,1,'Length of table dumped by trace recovery'
         FIELD BAMTITFL,X,1,'Trace facility flags',                    +
               BIT1=(BAMTITAB,'Master trace table required')
         FIELD BAMTINSP,N,1,'Default subpool'
         FIELD BAMTINLN,N,3,'Default size'
         FIELD BAMTVTCB,A,4,'IEEVIPLS TCB',                            +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=TCBTBL
         FIELD BAMJSCB,A,4,'Master scheduler JSCB',                    +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=JSCBTBL
         FIELD BAMTIOT,A,4,'Master scheduler TIOT',                    +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=TIOTTBL
         FIELD MSDDNAME,X,2,'DDNAME of SYSLOG dataset'
         FIELD BACHNL,A,4,'Last CSCB on persistent chain',             +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=CSCBTBL
         FIELD BASEXP,A,4,'BASEA extension',                           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
*              TABLE=BASEXTBL
         FIELD MSMSGID,X,4,'Message ID of IEE012A'
         FIELD BAJNCNT4,N,4,'NBR of devices monitoring JOBNAMES'
         FIELD BASESCT4,N,4,'NBR of devices monitoring SESSIONS'
         FIELD BASTCNT4,N,4,'NBR of devices monitoring STATUS'
         DC    X'FF'

         COPY     FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         IEEBASEA
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     REGEQU
         END      BASEATBL

CSCBTBL.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
CSCBTBL  CSECT
CSCBTBL  AMODE 31
CSCBTBL  RMODE ANY
         DC    CL8'CSCB'                 CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         DC    CL40'Command scheduling control block'
         DC    CL8'STORCB'               PANEL NAME
         FIELD BASE=CHAIN
         FIELD CHPTR,A,4,'Next CSCB',                                  +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=CSCBTBL
         FIELD CHVCD,X,1,'Verb code'
         FIELD CHSZE,N,1,'Size of this CSCB in double words'
         FIELD CHSTS,X,1,'Status flags',                               +
               BIT1=(CHAP,'Assignment pending'),                       +
               BIT2=(CHINFMT,'In pre-interpretation format'),          +
               BIT3=(CHSOUT,'Cancel all SYSOUT'),                      +
               BIT4=(CHQSPC,'Insufficent Queu space (causing 422)'),   +
               BIT5=(CHAD,'Add this CSCB to chain'),                   +
               BIT6=(CHDL,'Delete this CSCB from chain'),              +
               BIT7=(CHFC,'FREEMAIN this CSCB'),                       +
               BIT8=(CHABTERM,'Go to branch entry to ABTERM')
         FIELD CHACT,X,1,'Activity flags',                             +
               BIT1=(CHSWAP,'Swappable'),                              +
               BIT2=(CHTERM,'Terminal JOB'),                           +
               BIT3=(CHDISC,'Cancel implies disconnect'),              +
               BIT4=(CHDSI,'Data set inquiry (VS1)'),                  +
               BIT5=(CHCL,'Cancellable'),                              +
               BIT6=(CHCLD,'Cancel communication switch'),             +
               BIT7=(CHPOSTSS,'POST early address space'),             +
               BIT8=(CHAFORCE,'FORCE issued')
         FIELD CHKEY,C,8,'JOB name'
         FIELD CHCLS,C,8,'PROC name'
         FIELD CHCIBCTR,N,1,'Max queued CIB''s'
         FIELD CHTRKID,X,1,'CSCB type',                                +
               BIT1=(CHTSID,'TSO user'),                               +
               BIT2=(CHJOBID,'Batch job'),                             +
               BIT3=(CHINITID,'Initiator'),                            +
               BIT4=(CHSASID,'System address space'),                  +
               BIT5=(CHATXPID,'ATX address space'),                    +
               BIT6=(CHATXID,'ATX address space')
         FIELD CHDISP,X,1,'Command disposition',                       +
               BIT1=(CHDISPA,'Master authority recommended'),          +
               BIT2=(CHDISPM,'Command has master authority'),          +
               BIT3=(CHDISPC,'Command issued from MCS console'),       +
               BIT4=(CHDISPR,'Command issued before RACF active'),     +
               BIT5=(CHDISPE,'Issued by ARM')
         FIELD CHFLGS,X,1,'Flags',                                     +
               BIT1=(CHPMSI,'Command issued before MSI complete'),     +
               BIT2=(CHBIGRP,'Bypass initiator GET REGION'),           +
               BIT3=(CHNOALC,'Bypass Allocation environment setup')
         FIELD CHUTOK,A,4,'Command issuer UTOKEN addr',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CHCNSIDT,X,4,'Target console id'
         FIELD CHCNSIDI,X,4,'Issuing console id'
         FIELD CHCART,X,8,'Command and response token'
         FIELD CHVERSN,N,1,'CSCB version'
         FIELD CHPREVP,A,4,'Previous CSCB',                            +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=CSCBTBL
         FIELD CHCSCBID,C,4,'Eyecatcher'
         FIELD CHCSCXP,A,4,'CSCX address',                             +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CHOSYSN,C,8,'Original issuing system'
         DC    X'FF'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         IEECHAIN
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     REGEQU
         END      CSCBTBL

JESCTTBL.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
JESCTTBL CSECT
JESCTTBL AMODE 31
JESCTTBL RMODE ANY
         DC    CL8'JESCT'                CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         DC    CL40'Job entry subsystem communcation table'
         DC    CL8'STORCB '              PANEL NAME
         FIELD BASE=JESCT
         FIELD JESCTID,C,4,'Eyecatcher'
         FIELD JESUNITS,A,4,'SYSRES UCB address',                      +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=UCBTBL
         FIELD JESWAA,A,4,'SWA manager (locate mode)',                 +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESQMGR,A,4,'SWA manager (move mode)',                  +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESRESQM,A,4,'QMNGRIO interface to resident SWA mgr',   +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESSSREQ,A,4,'IEFSSREQ',                                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESSSCT,A,4,'First subsystem communication table-SSCT', +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESPJESN,C,4,'Primary subsystem name'
         FIELD JESALLOC,A,4,'Device allocation EP (used by initiator)',+
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESUNALC,A,4,'Device unallocation  (used by initiator)',+
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESCATL,A,4,'Device allocation private catalog EP',     +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESNUCBS,A,4,'Nbr of TAPE and DASD UCB''s in system',   +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESSASTA,A,4,'Subsystem allocation sequence table',     +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESEDT,A,4,'Allocation eligible device table',          +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESRECM,A,4,'IEFJRECM resource manager',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESRECF,A,4,'IEFJRECF resource manager',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESHASH,A,4,'Subsystem hash table',                     +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESNRSS,N,2,'Number of subsystems'
         FIELD JESFLG,X,1,'Flag byte',                                 +
               BIT1=(JESJSSNT,'IEFJSSNT exists'),                      +
               BIT2=(JESFSIT,'FSI trace installed'),                   +
               BIT3=(JESFRQEX,'SSI function request exit installed'),  +
               BIT4=(JESJSSNT,'IEFJSSNT exists')
         FIELD JESJESFG,X,1,'Primary subsystem flags',                 +
               BIT1=(JESPSUBA,'Primary subsystem active'),             +
               BIT2=(JESPSUBI,'JES3 sharing system consoles'),         +
               BIT3=(JES3ACTV,'JES3 active'),                          +
               BIT4=(JES3OUTD,'JES3 supports OUTADD/OUTDEL')
         FIELD JESALLOP,A,4,'Allocation descriptor block',             +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESALLOA,X,2,'ASID of allocation address space'
         FIELD JESALLOF,X,1,'Allocation flags',                        +
               BIT1=(JESUASR,'Unit allocation status recording'),      +
               BIT2=(JESUASF,'Unit alloc status recording failed'),    +
               BIT3=(JESUPLER,'UPL does not match UCB''s'),            +
               BIT4=(JESALRDY,'Allocation ready'),,                    +
               BIT5=(JESV2EDT,'EDT version 2 or later')
         FIELD JESPCDP,A,4,'PCDPARMS address',                         +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESAUCBS,N,4,'Number of UCBs in the system'
         FIELD JESDUECB,X,4,'Display allocation SDUMP ECB'
         FIELD JESUPLP,A,4,'UCB pointer list address',                 +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESMNTP,A,4,'Array of mountable device types',          +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESCTEXT,A,4,'Address of pagable JESCT extension',      +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JESPPT,A,4,'Program properties table',                  +
               PNS=STORCB
         FIELD JESRSTRT,A,4,'Restart code table',                      +
               PNS=STORCB
         FIELD JESPARSE,A,4,'Parser entry point',                      +
               PNS=STORCB
         FIELD JESXB603,A,4,'Restart component message module',        +
               PNS=STORCB
         FIELD JESDACA,A,4,'Device allocation communication area',     +
               PNS=STORCB
         FIELD JESDACA,A,4,'Device allocation communication area',     +
               PNS=STORCB
         DC    X'FF'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         IEFJESCT TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     REGEQU
         END      JESCTTBL

JSCBTBL.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
JSCBTBL  CSECT
JSCBTBL  AMODE 31
JSCBTBL  RMODE ANY
         DC    CL8'JSCB'                 CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         DC    CL40'Job step control block'
         DC    CL8'STORCB'               PANEL NAME
         FIELD BASE=IEZJSCB
         FIELD JSCHPCE,A,4,'Optional JES processor control element',   +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBSHR,A,4,'VSAM assembly chain',                      +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBTCP,A,4,'TIOT chaining element chain (VSAM)',       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBPCC,A,4,'Private catalog control block chain',      +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBTCBP,A,4,'Initiator''s TCB (VSAM)',                 +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBIJSC,A,4,'Initiator''s JSCB',                       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBDBTB,A,4,'Job step''s DEB table',                   +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBDCBA,A,3,'DCB for scheduler tables for this job',   +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBSTEP,N,1,'Step number'
         FIELD JSCBSECB,X,4,'ECB for main storage supervisor'
         FIELD JSCBOPTS,X,1,'Option switches',                         +
               BIT1=(JSCSIOTS,'Checkpoint must scan TIOT'),            +
               BIT2=(JSCBAUTH,'Step allowed to issue MODESET')
         FIELD JSCBSWT1,X,1,'Status switches',                         +
               BIT1=(JSCBPASS,'Bypass data set PASSWORD checking'),    +
               BIT2=(JSCBUNIN,'Allocation received cntl from INIT'),   +
               BIT3=(JSCBPMSG,'Open for dump data set failed')
         FIELD JSCBQMPI,A,4,'Queue manager parameter area',            +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBJESW,A,4,'JES work area',                           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBWTFG,X,1,'Flags used by WTP support',               +
               BIT1=(JSCBIOFG,'I/O error on previous WTP operation'),  +
               BIT2=(JSCBRET,'Addition text scanning required'),       +
               BIT3=(JSCBBMO,'Buffer messages only')
         FIELD JSCBWTSP,N,1,'Last step that issued WTP'
         FIELD JSCBPMG,N,2,'Number of WTP''s issued by step JSCBWTSP'
         FIELD JSCBCSCB,A,4,'CSCB address',                            +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=CSCBTBL
         FIELD JSCBJCT,X,4,'Structure containing SWA of JCT'
         FIELD JSCBPSCB,A,4,'TSO protected step control block (PSCB)', +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBASID,X,2,'ASID or TSO terminal job identifier'
         FIELD JSCBFBYT,X,1,'Flag byte',                               +
               BIT1=(JSCBADSP,'Automatic data set protection')
         FIELD JSCBIECB,X,4,'ECB (dynamic allocation and initiator)'
         FIELD JSCBJRBA,X,8,'Job journal RBA'
         FIELD JSCBALOC,A,4,'Allocation work area',                    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBJJSB,X,1,'Job journal status',                      +
               BIT1=(JSCBJNLN,'Do not write to journal'),              +
               BIT2=(JSCBJNLF,'No JOB journal'),                       +
               BIT3=(JSCBJNLE,'Error occurred in journal'),            +
               BIT4=(JSCBJSBI,'Job has not entered allocation'),       +
               BIT5=(JSCBJSBA,'Job has entered allocation'),           +
               BIT6=(JSCBJSBX,'Allocation completed'),                 +
               BIT7=(JSCBJSBT,'Job has entered termination')
         FIELD JSCBJNLR,A,4,'JOB journal RPL',                         +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBSMLR,A,4,'System message dataset RPL',              +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBSUB,A,4,'JES-SUBTL for this job step',              +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBSONO,N,2,'Number of SYSOUT data sets +1'
         FIELD JSCBFRBA,X,8,'RBA of first journal block'
         FIELD JSCBSSIB,A,4,'Subsystem identification block (SSIB)',   +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCDSABQ,A,4,'QDB for DSAB chain',                      +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBASW2,A,4,'Allocation STAE work area',               +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCSCT,X,4,'Structure containing SWA of SCT'
         FIELD JSCTMCOR,A,4,'TIOT main storage management area',       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBVATA,A,4,'VAT used during restart',                 +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCDDNNO,N,2,'Used by DYNALOC to generate DD names'
         FIELD JSCBODNO,N,2,'Used to generate OUTPUT descriptors'
         FIELD JSCDDNUM,N,2,'DD entries currently allocated'
         FIELD JSCBSWSP,N,1,'SWA subpool'
         FIELD JSCBACT,A,4,'Active JSCB',                              +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=JSCBTBL
         FIELD JSCBUFPT,A,4,'DYNALLOC write to programmer buffer',     +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBASWA,A,4,'Last allocation ETAE work area',          +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBASWA,A,4,'Last allocation ETAE work area',          +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBPGMN,C,8,'Program name'
         FIELD JSCDSNQP,A,4,'First DSENQ table',                       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCBCSCX,A,4,'CSCX',                                    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD JSCAMCPL,X,4,'Allocation message cellpool ID'
         DC    X'FF'

*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *

MTTBL.text:

         IEEZB806
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *

         END      MTTBL

               BIT5=(OUCBOFF,'WAIT state requested'),                  +
               BIT6=(OUCBOUT,'Swap out requested'),                    +
               BIT7=(OUCBLSW,'Logially swapped out'),                  +

               BIT2=(OUCBCSFM,'Swap in message required'),             +

         FIELD OUCBTNDP,X,1,'New TS dispatching priority'
         FIELD OUCBMFL,X,1,'Miscellaneous flags',                      +
               BIT1=(OUCBSBT,'Stole below threshold'),                 +

         FIELD OUCBWSCI,N,2,'Goal mode: service class index'
         FIELD OUCBWRCi,N,2,'Goal mode: report class index'

         FIELD OUCBSRC,X,1,'Swap out reason'
         FIELD OUCBSWC,N,2,'Transaction swaps'
         FIELD OUCBASCB,A,4,'ASCB address',                            +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=ASCBTBL
         FIELD OUCBPAGP,A,4,'APAG address',                            +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD OUCBTMW,T,4,'WLM interval start time'

         FIELD OUCBCPU,X,4,'CPU service units this interval'
         FIELD OUCBMSO,X,4,'MSO service units this interval'
         FIELD OUCBTMS,T,4,'Time of last swap action'

         FIELD OUCBDRFR,X,4,'DREF pages updated due to RSM IARXCNTF'
         FIELD OUCBACT,A,4,'Action queue forward address',             +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD OUCBACN,X,2,'Deferred action flags'
         FIELD OUCBCFL,X,1,'Multiprocess condition flags',             +
               BIT1=(OUCBRDY,'USERRDY event received'),                +
               BIT2=(OUCBRSM,'RSM service pending'),                   +
               BIT3=(OUCBESSS,'Suspended for swap out to exxtended'),  +
               BIT4=(OUCBESSW,'Swapped out to extended'),              +
               BIT5=(OUCBASSW,'Swapped out to auxillary'),             +
               BIT6=(OUCBCSMF,'Notify SMF of swap in'),                +
               BIT7=(OUCBSHBN,'Server history block needed'),          +
               BIT8=(OUCBHITR,'HIT has run since UserRdy')
         FIELD OUCBCSBT,X,1,'Compare and swap bits',                   +

         FIELD OUCBTML,N,4,'Time of last TERMWAIT'

         FIELD OUCBHST,N,4,'Interval HIPERSPACE service'

         FIELD OUCBRPG,N,2,'Reset performance group'

               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=CVTTBL

         FIELD FLCSOPSW,X,8,'SVC interrupt old PSW'
         FIELD FLCPOPSW,X,8,'Program check interrupt old PSW'
         FIELD FLCMOPSW,X,8,'Machine check interrupt old PSW'
         FIELD FLCIOPSW,X,8,'I/O interrupt old PSW'
         FIELD FLCCVT2,A,4,'Address of CVT (used by dump)'

         FIELD FLCSNPSW,X,8,'SVC interrupt new PSW'
         FIELD FLCPNPSW,X,8,'Program check new PSW'
         FIELD FLCMNPSW,X,8,'Machine check new PSW'

         FIELD FLCSVCN,X,2,'SVC interrupt code (hex)'

               BIT1=(PSAPIPER,'PER interrupt'),                        +
               BIT2=(PSAPIMC,'Monitor call'),                          +
               BIT3=(32,'Unsolicited program interrupt'),              +
               BIT4=(16,'Unsolicited program interrupt'),              +
               BIT5=(08,'Unsolicited program interrupt'),              +
               BIT6=(04,'Unsolicited program interrupt'),              +
               BIT7=(02,'Unsolicited program interrupt'),              +

               BIT3=(FLCFZARA,'z/Architecture active'),                +
               BIT4=(FLCFASLX,'ASN and LX reuse facility installed')

               BIT4=(FLCFLDHP,'Long displacement high performance'),   +
               BIT5=(FLCFHMAS,'HFP multiply/add/subtract'),            +
               BIT6=(FLCFEIMM,'Extended immediate'),                   +
               BIT7=(FLCFETF3,'Extended translation facility'),        +
               BIT8=(FLCFHUN,'HFP unnormalized extension')
         FIELD FLCFACL3,X,1,'Byte 3 of FACL',                          +
               BIT1=(FLCFET2E,'ETF2 enhancement'),                     +
               BIT2=(FLCFSTKF,'STCKF enhancement'),                    +
               BIT3=(FLCFET3E,'ETF3 enhancement'),                     +

         FIELD PSAPCCAV,A,4,'Virtual address of PCCA',                 +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD PSAPCCAR,A,4,'REAL address of PCCA'
         FIELD PSALCCAV,A,4,'Virtual address of LCCA',                 +
               PNS=STORSTOR

         FIELD PSATNEW,A,4,'TCB address',                              +

               TABLE=TCBTBL

               PNS=STORCB,                                             +

         FIELD PSAANEW,A,4,'ASCB address',                             +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=ASCBTBL
         FIELD PSAAOLD,A,4,'Current ASCB address',                     +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=ASCBTBL
         FIELD PSASUP1,X,1,'First supervisor control byte',            +
               BIT1=(PSAIO,'I/O FLIH'),                                +
               BIT2=(PSASVC,'SVC FLIH'),                               +
               BIT3=(PSAEXT,'External interrupt FLIH'),                +
               BIT4=(PSAPI,'Program check interrupt FLIH'),            +
               BIT5=(PSALOCK,'Lock routine'),                          +
               BIT6=(PSADISP,'Dispatcher'),                            +
               BIT7=(PSATCTL,'TCTL recovery'),                         +
               BIT8=(PSATYPE6,'Type 6 SVC in control')
         FIELD PSASUP2,X,1,'Second supervisor control byte',           +
               BIT1=(PSAIPCRI,'Remote immediate signal service'),      +
               BIT2=(PSASVCR,'Super FRR SVC recursion'),               +
               BIT3=(PSASVCRR,'SVC recovery recursion'),               +
               BIT4=(PSAACR,'Automatic CPU reconfiguration'),          +
               BIT5=(PSARTM,'Recovery termination manager in control'),+
               BIT6=(PSALCR,'RTM called supervisor analysis router')
         FIELD PSASUP3,X,1,'Third supervisor control byte',            +
               BIT1=(PSAIOSUP,'IOS in disabled WAIT'),                 +
               BIT2=(PSASPR,'Super FRR is active'),                    +
               BIT3=(PSAESTA,'SVC 60 recovery active'),                +
               BIT4=(PSARSM,'RSM entered for page fix'),               +
               BIT5=(PSAULCMS,'Lock mgr unconditional or CMS lock'),   +
               BIT6=(PSASLIP,'IEAVTSLP recursion control bit')
         FIELD PSASUP4,X,1,'Fourth supervisor control byte',           +
               BIT1=(PSALDWT,'BLWLDWT is in control'),                 +
               BIT2=(PSASMF,'SMF suspend/reset'),                      +
               BIT3=(PSAESAR,'Supervisor analysis is active'),         +
               BIT4=(PSAMCH,'Machine check handler is active')
         FIELD PSAProcClass_Byte1,X,1,'Special processor flags',       +
               BIT1=(PSAProcClass_zAAP,'zAAP processor'),              +
               BIT2=(PSAProcClass_zIIP,'zIIP processor')
         FIELD PSAILS,X,1,'Interrupt handler link stack flags',        +
               BIT1=(PSAILSIO,'I/O FLIH is using the linkage stack'),  +
               BIT2=(PSAILSEX,'External FLIH using linkage stack'),    +
               BIT3=(PSAILSPC,'Program check FLIH using link stack'),  +
               BIT4=(PSAILSDS,'Dispatcher using the linkage stack'),   +
               BIT5=(PSAILSRS,'Restart FLIH using the linkage stack'), +
               BIT6=(PSAILSOR,'Exit using linkage stack'),             +
               BIT7=(PSAILST6,'Type 6 SVC using linkage stack'),       +
               BIT8=(PSAILSLK,'RSM or higher lock in effect')
         FIELD PSALSVCI,X,2,'Last SVC'
         FIELD PSAFLAGS,X,1,'System flags',                            +
               BIT1=(PSAAEIT,'Addressing in transition'),              +
               BIT2=(PSAFPAC,'FP simulation is active'),               +
               BIT3=(PSAFPPE,'Program interrupt expected')
         FIELD PSALKCRF,A,4,'Linkage stack pointer save area',         +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD PSAMPSW,X,8,'SETLOCK model PSW'
         FIELD PSAMCHEX,X,8,'Machine check exit PSW'
         FIELD PSAMCHEX,X,8,'Machine check exit PSW'
         FIELD PSAHLHIS,X,4,'Save area for PSAHLHI'
         FIELD PSARECUR,X,1,'Restart FLIH recursion indicator',        +
               VALUE1=(0,'FLIH not in control'),                       +
               VALUE2=(255,'Entry is recursive')
         FIELD PSARSSM,X,1,'STNSM area for IEAVERES'
         FIELD PSASNSM2,X,1,'STNSM area for IEAVTRT1'
         FIELD PSARTM1S,X,1,'Bits 1-7 of PSW (PSARTM1R of RSM)'
         FIELD PSALWTSA,X,4,'Save area addr (Restartable WAIT)'
         FIELD PSADISPL,X,4,'Global dispatcher lock'
         FIELD PSAASML,X,4,'ASM lock'
         FIELD PSASALCL,X,4,'Space allocation lock'
         FIELD PSAIOSSL,X,4,'IOS sync lock'
         FIELD PSARSMDL,X,4,'RSM data space lock'
         FIELD PSAIOSUL,X,4,'IOS unit control block lock'
         FIELD PSATPACL,X,4,'TCAM TPACBDEB lock'
         FIELD PSAOPTL,X,4,'Optimizer lock'
         FIELD PSARSMGL,X,4,'RSM global lock'
         FIELD PSAVFIXL,X,4,'VSM fixed subpools lock'
         FIELD PSAASMGL,X,4,'ASM global lock'
         FIELD PSARSMSL,X,4,'RSM steal lock'
         FIELD PSARSMXL,X,4,'RSM cross memory lock'
         FIELD PSARSMAL,X,4,'RSM address space lock'
         FIELD PSAVPAGL,X,4,'VSM pageable subpools lock'
         FIELD PSARSMCL,X,4,'RSM common lock'
         FIELD PSARSML,X,4,'RSM global function/recovery lock'
         FIELD PSARSMCL,X,4,'RSM common lock',                         +
               BIT1=(PSARSMEX,'Exclusive lock being held')
         FIELD PSAIOSL,X,4,'IOS lock'
         DC    X'FF'

*                                                                     *
