         COPY    FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         IBMMAC  PSA=LIST
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         END     PSATBL

RBEX1.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*        Process the RBTMFLD flags                                    *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
RBEX1    CSECT
RBEX1    AMODE 31
RBEX1    RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING RBEX1,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'RBEX1'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                        COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING RBEX1,R10                      DEFINE BASE
         USING STORCOMM,R9
         L     R15,SESS_DXD_ADDR              WORK AREA BASE
         A     R15,DXD_START                  PLUS DISP
         ST    R13,4(,R15)                    SAVE R13
         ST    R15,8(,R13)                    CHAIN SAVE AREA
         LR    R13,R15
         USING DXDRB1,R13                     DEFINE WORK AREA BASE
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY
         CLI   STORCOMM_FUNCTION,$STORCOMM_COMMAND
         BE    EXIT0000
         L     R5,STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR          RB ADDRESS
         USING RBBASIC,R5
         L     R3,FIELD_EXIT_PNS              CURRENT POINT-AND-SHOOT
         L     R6,FIELD_EXIT_VDATA
         LH    R7,FIELD_EXIT_LINES
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_OK   SET DEFAULT STATUS
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8

         ITRACE ID=ZERO
         OI    COMM_FLAGS,$COMM_AUTH_ON       REQUEST APF AUTHORIZATION
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                        CALL OSAUTH
         MODESET KEY=ZERO                     ENTER KEY ZERO
         NI    COMM_FLAGS,255-$COMM_AUTH_ON   REQUEST APF OFF
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                        CALL OSAUTH
         LAM   R5,R5,F1                       SET AR
         SAC   512                            ENTER AR MODE
         TM    RBTMFLD,RBTMQUE                FLAG ON?
         BNO   MAIN0010                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
V        USING MSG01,R6
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG02
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0010 DS    0H
         TM    RBTMFLD,RBTMTOD                FLAG ON?
         BNO   MAIN0020                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG03
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0020 DS    0H
         TM    RBTMFLD,RBWLIM                 FLAG ON?
         BNO   MAIN0030                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG04
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0030 DS    0H
         TM    RBTMFLD,RBTMCMP                FLAG ON?
         BNO   MAIN0040                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG05
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0040 DS    0H
         TM    RBTMFLD,RBTMIND2               FLAG ON?
         BNO   MAIN0050                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG06
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0050 DS    0H
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         TM    RBTMFLD,RBRREQ                 REAL REQUEST?
         BO    MAIN0060                       YES
         TM    RBTMFLD,RBTREQ                 TASK REQUEST?
         BO    MAIN0070                       YES
         TM    RBTMFLD,RBTREQ                 WAIT REQUEST?
         BO    MAIN0070                       YES
         B     EXIT0000
MAIN0060 DS    0H
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG07             REAL
         B     MAIN0090
MAIN0070 DS    0H
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG08             TASK
         B     MAIN0090
MAIN0080 DS    0H
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG09             WAIT
MAIN0090 DS    0H
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
         B     EXIT0000
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Next line on display                                         *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
LINE0000 DS    0H
         LA    R3,PNS_L(,R3)                  NEXT IN PNS TABLE
         A     R6,SPF_VWIDTH                  NEXT LINE
         BCT   R7,LINE0010                    MINUS 1 AVAILABLE LINE
         B     EXIT0000                       SCREEN FULL.. EXIT
LINE0010 DS    0H
         BR    R1
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
EXIT0000 DS    0H
         SAC   0
         LAM   R5,R5,F0                       RESET AR
         OI    COMM_FLAGS,$COMM_AUTH_ON       REQUEST APF AUTHORIZATION
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                        CALL OSAUTH
         ITRACE ID=NZERO
         MODESET KEY=NZERO                    RESET STORAGE PROTECT KEY
         NI    COMM_FLAGS,255-$COMM_AUTH_ON   REQUEST APF OFF
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                        CALL OSAUTH
         ITRACE ID=EXIT
         ST    R3,FIELD_EXIT_PNS
         ST    R6,FIELD_EXIT_VDATA
         STH   R7,FIELD_EXIT_LINES
         L     R13,4(,R13)                    RESTORE R13
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)                RESTORE REGISTERS
         SR    R15,R15
         BR    R14                            RETURN
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START    DC     Q(DXDRB1)

F0           DC     F'0'
F1           DC     F'1'

MSG01        DS     0C
             DC     AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_TURQUOISE)
MSG01_DISP   DC     CL04' '
             DC     AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH)
MSG01_NAME   DC     CL08' '
             DC     AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_NORMAL)
MSG01_DATA   DC     CL20' '
             DC     CL04' '
MSG01_ATTR   DC     AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_GREEN)
MSG01_DESC   DC     CL40' '
MSG01_L      EQU    *-MSG01

MSG02        DC     CL40'Timer element not on queue'
MSG03        DC     CL40'Local time of day option'
MSG04        DC     CL40'WAIT limit exceeded'
MSG05        DC     CL40'Interval has expired'
MSG06        DC     CL40'Exit specified with TASK or REAL'
MSG07        DC     CL40'REAL'
MSG08        DC     CL40'TASK'
MSG09        DC     CL40'WAIT'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXDRB1       DSECT
             COPY     DXDPREF
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COMMON
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             SESSION  TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             IHARB    DSECT=YES,LIST=YES
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             BPXYSTAT DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             STORCOMM
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     PNS
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             OSSPFD   TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     TRENTRY
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     ATTRS
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     REGEQU
             END      RBEX1

RBTBL.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
RBTBL    CSECT
RBTBL    AMODE 31
RBTBL    RMODE ANY
         DC    CL8'RB'                   CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         DC    CL40'Request block'
         DC    CL8'STORCB'               PANEL NAME
         FIELD BASE=RBBASIC
         FIELD RBTMFLD,X,1,'Timer flags',                              +
               EXIT=RBEX1
         FIELD RBEXRTNM,X,8,'Error exit name'
         FIELD RBSTAB1,X,1,'Flags',                                    +
               BIT1=(RBFTCKPT,'Checkpoints may be taken in user exit')
         FIELD RBSTAB2,X,1,'Flags',                                    +
               BIT1=(RBTCBNXT,'RBLINK points to TCB'),                 +
               BIT2=(RBFACTV,'(S)IRB queued to TCB'),                  +
               BIT3=(RBFDYN,'Storage can be freed at exit'),           +
               BIT4=(RBECBWT,'WAITing for a number of events')
         FIELD RBOPSW,X,8,'Old PSW'
         FIELD RBWCF,N,1,'Number of requests WAITing'
         FIELD RBLINKB,A,3,'Previous RB (TCB if this is first RB)',    +
               EXIT=RBEX2
         DC    X'FF'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         IHARB    DSECT=YES,LIST=YES
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     REGEQU
         END      RBTBL

RCVTEX01.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*    Note:  This exit does NOT need to switch to AR mode              *
*           or key zero.  The RCVT is in common storage.              *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
RCVTEX01 CSECT
RCVTEX01 AMODE 31
RCVTEX01 RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING RCVTEX01,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'RCVTEX01'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                        COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING RCVTEX01,R10                   DEFINE BASE
         USING STORCOMM,R9
         L     R15,SESS_DXD_ADDR              WORK AREA BASE
         A     R15,DXD_START                  PLUS DISP
         ST    R13,4(,R15)                    SAVE R13
         ST    R15,8(,R13)                    CHAIN SAVE AREA
         LR    R13,R15
         USING DXDRCVT1,R13                   DEFINE WORK AREA BASE
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY,                                              +
               DATA1=(STORCOMM_FUNCTION,1)
         CLI   STORCOMM_FUNCTION,$STORCOMM_COMMAND
         BE    EXIT0000
         L     R5,STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR          RCVT ADDRESS
         USING RCVT,R5
         L     R3,FIELD_EXIT_PNS              CURRENT PNS
         L     R6,FIELD_EXIT_VDATA
         LH    R7,FIELD_EXIT_LINES
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_OK   SET DEFAULT STATUS
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8
         TM    RCVTEROP,RCVTTERP              TERMINAL AUTHORIZATION?
         BNO   MAIN0010                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
V        USING MSG01,R6
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG02
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0010 DS    0H
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         TM    RCVTEROP,RCVTTUAC              DEFAULT NONE?
         BO    MAIN0020
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG03
         B     MAIN0030
MAIN0020 DS    0H
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG04
MAIN0030 DS    0H
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
         TM    RCVTEROP,RCVTAVIO              DO NOT CREATE LOG RECORD?
         BNO   MAIN0040                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG05
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0040 DS    0H
         TM    RCVTEROP,RCVTSAUD              DO NOT AUDIT SPECIAL USER
         BNO   EXIT0000                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG06
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
         B     EXIT0000
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Next line on display                                         *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
LINE0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=NEXTLINE,                                           +
               RDATA1=R6,                                              +
               RDATA2=R7
         LA    R3,PNS_L(,R3)                  NEXT IN PNS
         A     R6,SPF_VWIDTH                  NEXT LINE
         BCT   R7,LINE0010                    MINUS 1 AVAILABLE LINE
         B     EXIT0000                       SCREEN FULL.. EXIT
LINE0010 DS    0H
         BR    R1
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
EXIT0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=EXIT
         ST    R3,FIELD_EXIT_PNS
         ST    R6,FIELD_EXIT_VDATA
         STH   R7,FIELD_EXIT_LINES
         L     R13,4(,R13)                    RESTORE R13
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)                RESTORE REGISTERS
         SR    R15,R15
         BR    R14                            RETURN
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START    DC     Q(DXDRCVT1)

MSG01        DS     0C
             DC     AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_TURQUOISE)
MSG01_DISP   DC     CL04' '
             DC     AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH)
MSG01_NAME   DC     CL08' '
             DC     AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_NORMAL)
MSG01_DATA   DC     CL20' '
             DC     CL04' '
MSG01_ATTR   DC     AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_GREEN)
MSG01_DESC   DC     CL40' '
MSG01_L      EQU    *-MSG01

MSG02        DC     CL40'Terminal authorization checking'
MSG03        DC     CL40'Terminal UACC=READ'
MSG04        DC     CL40'Terminal UACC=NONE'
MSG05        DC     CL40'Do not create log record for cmd violation'
MSG06        DC     CL40'Do not audit special user'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXDRCVT1     DSECT
             COPY     DXDPREF
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COMMON
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             SESSION  TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             ICHPRCVT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             BPXYSTAT DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             STORCOMM
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     PNS
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             OSSPFD   TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     TRENTRY
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     ATTRS
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     REGEQU
             END      RCVTEX01

RCVTEX02.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*    Note:  This exit does NOT need to switch to AR mode              *
*           or key zero.  The RCVT is in common storage.              *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
RCVTEX02 CSECT
RCVTEX02 AMODE 31
RCVTEX02 RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING RCVTEX02,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'RCVTEX02'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                        COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING RCVTEX02,R10                   DEFINE BASE
         USING STORCOMM,R9
         L     R15,SESS_DXD_ADDR              WORK AREA BASE
         A     R15,DXD_START                  PLUS DISP
         ST    R13,4(,R15)                    SAVE R13
         ST    R15,8(,R13)                    CHAIN SAVE AREA
         LR    R13,R15
         USING DXDRCVT2,R13                   DEFINE WORK AREA BASE
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY,                                              +
               DATA1=(STORCOMM_FUNCTION,1)
         CLI   STORCOMM_FUNCTION,$STORCOMM_COMMAND
         BE    EXIT0000
         L     R5,STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR          RCVT ADDRESS
         USING RCVT,R5
         L     R3,FIELD_EXIT_PNS
         L     R6,FIELD_EXIT_VDATA
         LH    R7,FIELD_EXIT_LINES
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_OK   SET DEFAULT STATUS
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8
         TM    RCVTFLG1,RCVTFPDS              FAST PATH FOR DATA SETS?
         BNO   MAIN0010
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
V        USING MSG01,R6
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG02
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0010 DS    0H
         TM    RCVTFLG1,RCVTTDSN              TAPE DATA SET PROTECTION?
         BNO   MAIN0020
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG03
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0020 DS    0H
         TM    RCVTFLG1+1,RCVTPRO             PROTECT ALL?
         BNO   MAIN0050
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         TM    RCVTFLG1+1,RCVTPROF            PROTECT ALL FAIL?
         BNO   MAIN0030                       NO
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG04
         B     MAIN0040
MAIN0030 DS    0H
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG05
MAIN0040 DS    0H
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0050 DS    0H
         TM    RCVTFLG1+1,RCVTEOS             ERASE ON SCRATCH?
         BNO   MAIN0070                       NO
         TM    RCVTFLG1+1,RCVTEOSL            ERASE ON SCRATCH SECLEVEL
         BNO   MAIN0060                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG06
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0060 DS    0H
         TM    RCVTFLG1+1,RCVTEOSA            ERASE ON SCRATCH ALL?
         BNO   MAIN0070                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG07
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0070 DS    0H
         TM    RCVTFLG1+2,RCVTPROG            ACCESS CONTROL BY PROGRAM
         BNO   EXIT0000                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG08
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
         B     EXIT0000
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Next line on display                                         *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
LINE0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=NEXTLINE,                                           +
               RDATA1=R6,                                              +
               RDATA2=R7
         LA    R3,PNS_L(,R3)
         A     R6,SPF_VWIDTH                  NEXT LINE
         BCT   R7,LINE0010                    MINUS 1 AVAILABLE LINE
         B     EXIT0000                       SCREEN FULL.. EXIT
LINE0010 DS    0H
         BR    R1
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
EXIT0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=EXIT
         ST    R3,FIELD_EXIT_PNS
         ST    R6,FIELD_EXIT_VDATA
         STH   R7,FIELD_EXIT_LINES
         L     R13,4(,R13)                    RESTORE R13
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)                RESTORE REGISTERS
         SR    R15,R15
         BR    R14                            RETURN
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START    DC       Q(DXDRCVT2)

MSG01        DS       0C
             DC       AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_TURQUOISE)
MSG01_DISP   DC       CL04' '
             DC       AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH)
MSG01_NAME   DC       CL08' '
             DC       AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_NORMAL)
MSG01_DATA   DC       CL20' '
             DC       CL04' '
MSG01_ATTR   DC       AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_GREEN)
MSG01_DESC   DC       CL40' '
MSG01_L      EQU      *-MSG01

MSG02        DC       CL40'Fast path for data sets'
MSG03        DC       CL40'Tape data set protection'
MSG04        DC       CL40'Protect-all FAIL'
MSG05        DC       CL40'Protect-all WARN'
MSG06        DC       CL40'Erase on scratch by SECLEVEL'
MSG07        DC       CL40'Erase on scratch ALL'
MSG08        DC       CL40'Access control by program'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXDRCVT2          DSECT
                  COPY   DXDPREF
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  COMMON
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  SESSION  TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  ICHPRCVT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  BPXYSTAT DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  STORCOMM
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  COPY     PNS
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  OSSPFD   TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  COPY     TRENTRY
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  COPY     ATTRS
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  COPY     REGEQU
                  END      RCVTEX02

RCVTEX03.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*    Note:  This exit does NOT need to switch to AR mode              *
*           or key zero.  The RCVT is in common storage.              *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
RCVTEX03 CSECT
RCVTEX03 AMODE 31
RCVTEX03 RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING RCVTEX03,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'RCVTEX03'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                        COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING RCVTEX03,R10                   DEFINE BASE
         USING STORCOMM,R9
         L     R15,SESS_DXD_ADDR              WORK AREA BASE
         A     R15,DXD_START                  PLUS DISP
         ST    R13,4(,R15)                    SAVE R13
         ST    R15,8(,R13)                    CHAIN SAVE AREA
         LR    R13,R15
         USING DXDRCVT3,R13                   DEFINE WORK AREA BASE
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY,                                              +
               DATA1=(STORCOMM_FUNCTION,1)
         CLI   STORCOMM_FUNCTION,$STORCOMM_COMMAND
         BE    EXIT0000
         L     R3,FIELD_EXIT_PNS
         L     R5,STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR          RCVT ADDRESS
         USING RCVT,R5
         L     R6,FIELD_EXIT_VDATA
         LH    R7,FIELD_EXIT_LINES
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_OK   SET DEFAULT STATUS
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8
         TM    RCVTMFL1,RCVTXUSP              EXTENDED INITUSP?
         BNO   MAIN0010                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
V        USING MSG01,R6
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG02
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0010 DS    0H
         TM    RCVTMFL1,RCVTXFAR              FASTAUTH?
         BNO   MAIN0020                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG03
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0020 DS    0H
         TM    RCVTMFL1,RCVTENVS              ENVIRONMENT SERVICES?
         BNO   MAIN0030                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG04
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0030 DS    0H
         TM    RCVTMFL1,RCVTX500              X500NAME?
         BNO   MAIN0040                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG05
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
MAIN0040 DS    0H
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         TM    RCVTMFL1,RCVTPSEN              ENHANCED PGMSECURITY?
         BO    MAIN0050                       YES
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG06
         B     MAIN0060
MAIN0050 DS    0H
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG07
MAIN0060 DS    0H
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         TM    RCVTMFL1,RCVTPSWR              WARNING MODE?
         BO    MAIN0070                       YES
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG08
         B     MAIN0080
MAIN0070 DS    0H
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG09
MAIN0080 DS    0H
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         TM    RCVTMFL1,RCVTLPAP              ATTCH1ST REQUIRED?
         BO    MAIN0090                       YES
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG10
         B     MAIN0100
MAIN0090 DS    0H
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG11
MAIN0100 DS    0H
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
         TM    RCVTMFL1,RCVTFGSG              FILE.GROUPOWNER.SETGID?
         BNO   exit0000                       NO
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG12
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
         B     EXIT0000
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Next line on display                                         *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
LINE0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=NEXTLINE,                                           +
               RDATA1=R6,                                              +
               RDATA2=R7
         LA    R3,PNS_L(,R3)
         A     R6,SPF_VWIDTH                  NEXT LINE
         BCT   R7,LINE0010                    MINUS 1 AVAILABLE LINE
         B     EXIT0000                       SCREEN FULL.. EXIT
LINE0010 DS    0H
         BR    R1
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
EXIT0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=EXIT
         ST    R3,FIELD_EXIT_PNS
         ST    R6,FIELD_EXIT_VDATA
         STH   R7,FIELD_EXIT_LINES
         L     R13,4(,R13)                    RESTORE R13
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)                RESTORE REGISTERS
         SR    R15,R15
         BR    R14                            RETURN
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START    DC       Q(DXDRCVT3)

MSG01        DS       0C
             DC       AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_TURQUOISE)
MSG01_DISP   DC       CL04' '
             DC       AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH)
MSG01_NAME   DC       CL08' '
             DC       AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_NORMAL)
MSG01_DATA   DC       CL20' '
             DC       CL04' '
MSG01_ATTR   DC       AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_GREEN)
MSG01_DESC   DC       CL40' '
MSG01_L      EQU      *-MSG01

MSG02        DC       CL40'Extended INITSUP support'
MSG03        DC       CL40'FASTAUTH RACLIST SUPPORT'
MSG04        DC       CL40'ENVIRONMENT SERVICES AVAILABLE'
MSG05        DC       CL40'X500NAME SUPPORT AVAILABLE'
MSG06        DC       CL40'BASIC PGMSECURITY'
MSG07        DC       CL40'ENHANCED PGMSECURITY'
MSG08        DC       CL40'PGMSECURITY IN FAIL MODE'
MSG09        DC       CL40'PGMSECURITY IN WARN MODE'
MSG10        DC       CL40'RACF REQ=FAE ATTCH1ST NOT REQUIRED'
MSG11        DC       CL40'RACF REQ=FAE ATTCH1ST REQUIRED'
MSG12        DC       CL40'FILE.GROUPOWNER.SETGID EXISTS'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXDRCVT3     DSECT
             COPY   DXDPREF
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COMMON
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             SESSION  TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             ICHPRCVT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             BPXYSTAT DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             STORCOMM
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     PNS
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             OSSPFD   TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     TRENTRY
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     ATTRS
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     REGEQU
             END      RCVTEX03

               PNS=STORSTOR

               PNS=STORSTOR

         FIELD RCVTSINT,N,2,'LU session interval'
         FIELD RCVTML2F,X,1,'Multilevel security options',             +
               BIT1=(RCVTMLFS,'Seclabels required for fs objects'),    +
               BIT2=(RCVTMLIP,'Seclabels required for IPC objects'),   +
               BIT3=(RCVTMLNM,'Display names restricted by seclevel'), +
               BIT4=(RCVTSBYS,'Seclabel by system requested')
         FIELD RCVTFLG3,X,1,'Misc flags',                              +
               BIT1=(RCVTDCDT,'Dynamic CDT active'),                   +
               BIT2=(RCVTPLC,'Allow lowercase passwords')
         FIELD RCVTPMIN,N,1,'Minimum interval for passwords'
         FIELD RCVTTMP2,A,4,'RDS templates addr',                      +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD RCVTRCK4,A,4,'IRRRCK04 addr',                           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD RCVTSVC0,A,4,'ICHSVC00 addr',                           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD RCVTPTGN,A,4,'Passticket routine',                      +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD RCVTFRX4,A,4,'FASTAUTH post processing exit',           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD RCVTDX11,A,4,'ICHDEX11 addr',                           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD RCVTXLT0,A,4,'IRRRTX02 addr',                           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD RCVTGLS6,A,4,'ICHGLS06 addr',                           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD RCVTDPTB,A,4,'Dynamic parse table',                     +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD RCVTRCK2,A,4,'IRRRCK02 addr',                           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD RCVTRX10,A,4,'IRRRXT10 addr',                           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD RCVTRX11,A,4,'IRRRXT11 addr',                           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD RCVTDSPC,A,4,'IRRDSP00 addr',                           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD RCVTFL2X,X,1,'SETROPTS options',                        +
               BIT1=(RCVTCMPM,'Compat mode on'),                       +
               BIT2=(RCVTMLSF,'MLS failures on'),                      +
               BIT3=(RCVTMLAF,'MLACTIVE failures on'),                 +
               BIT4=(RCVTCATF,'CATDSNS failures on'),                  +
               BIT5=(RCVTAAPL,'APLAUDIT'),                             +
               BIT6=(RCVTNADC,'NOADDCREATOR')
         FIELD RCVTNJEF,X,1,'NJE flags',                               +
               BIT1=(RCVTJWTO,'WTO issued for NJE')
         FIELD RCVTCDTL,N,4,'Length of a CDT'
         DC       X'FF'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY  FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         ICHPRCVT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         END      RCVTTBL

STGXTBL.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
STGXTBL  CSECT
STGXTBL  AMODE 31
STGXTBL  RMODE ANY
         DC    CL8'STGX'                 CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         DC    CL40'Virtual storage extension'
         DC    CL8'STORCB'               PANEL NAME
         FIELD BASE=CVTVSTGX
         FIELD CVTMLPAS,A,4,'Starting address of MLPA',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTMLPAE,A,4,'Ending address of MLPA',                  +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTFLPAS,A,4,'Starting address of FLPA',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTFLPAE,A,4,'Ending address of FLPA',                  +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTPLPAS,A,4,'Starting address of PLPA',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTPLPAE,A,4,'Ending address of PLPA',                  +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTRWNS,A,4,'Starting address of READ/WRITE nucleus',   +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTRWNE,A,4,'Ending address of READ/WRITE nucleus',     +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTRONS,A,4,'Starting address of READ ONLY nucleus',    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTRONE,A,4,'Ending address of READ ONLY nucleus',      +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTRWNS,A,4,'Starting address of extended R/W nucleus', +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTRWNE,A,4,'Ending address of extended R/W nucleus',   +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTEPLPS,A,4,'Starting address of extended PLPA',       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTEPLPE,A,4,'Ending address of extended PLPA',         +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTEFLPS,A,4,'Starting address of extended FLPA',       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTEFLPE,A,4,'Ending address of extended FLPA',         +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTEMLPS,A,4,'Starting address of extended MLPA',       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD CVTEMLPE,A,4,'Ending address of extended MLPA',         +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         DC    X'FF'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY  FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         IBMMAC   CVT=LIST
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         END      STGXTBL

STORACEE.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*  Module name: STORACEE                                              *
*                                                                     *
*  Set current address to selected address space's ACEE               *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
STORACEE CSECT
STORACEE AMODE 31
STORACEE RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING STORACEE,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'STORACEE'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                 SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                         COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING STORACEE,R10                    DEFINE BASE
         USING STORCOMM,R9                     DEFINE BASE
         L     R15,SESS_DXD_ADDR               WORK AREA BASE
         A     R15,DXD_START                   PLUS DISP
         ST    R13,4(,R15)                     SAVE R13
         ST    R15,8(,R13)                     CHAIN SAVE AREA
         LR    R13,R15
         USING DXDACEE,R13                     DEFINE WORK AREA BASE
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8
         MVC   SPF_ZCMD,COMM_BLANKS
         OI    COMM_FLAGS,$COMM_AUTH_ON
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                         TURN ON APF AUTH
         MODESET KEY=ZERO
         LH    R1,STORCOMM_ASID
         ITRACE ID=SSAR,                                               +
               RDATA1=R1
         SSAR  (R1)
         LAM   R5,R5,F1                        SET AR
         SAC   512                             ENTER AR MODE
         L     R5,STORCOMM_ASCB                ASCB ADDRESS
         USING ASCB,R5                         DEFINE BASE
         L     R5,ASCBASXB                     ASXB ADDRESS
         USING ASXB,R5                         DEFINE BASE
         MVC   STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,ASXBSENV     COPY ACEE ADDRESS
         SAC   0                               TURN OFF AR MODE
         LAM   R5,R5,F0                        RESET AR
         EPAR  (R1)
         ITRACE ID=RESET,                                              +
               RDATA1=R1
         SSAR  (R1)
         MODESET KEY=NZERO                     REQUEST NORMAL KEY
         NI    COMM_FLAGS,255-$COMM_AUTH_ON
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                         TURN OFF APF AUTH
         ITRACE ID=ACEE,                                               +
               DATA1=(STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,4)
         XC    STORCOMM_DATA_DISP,STORCOMM_DATA_DISP
         CLC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,STOR_PANEL
         BE    ACEE0010
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORCB
         L     R1,V_ACEETBL                    FORMATTING INFO TABLE
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE            SET ADDRESS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,0(R1)          COPY CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,8(R1)   COPY CONTROL BLOCK DESC
         MVC   STORCOMM_PANEL_NAME,48(R1)      COPY PANEL NAME
         MVC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,48(R1)          COPY PANEL NAME
         LA    R1,56(,R1)                      FIRST FIELD
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST
         B     EXIT0000
ACEE0010 DS    0H
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORSTOR
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,COMM_BLANKS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,COMM_BLANKS
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_TABLE,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_FIRST,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_LAST,STORCOMM_CB_LAST
EXIT0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=EXIT
         L     R13,4(,R13)                     RESTORE R13
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)                 RESTORE REGISTERS
         SR    R15,R15                         SET RC
         BR    R14
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START      DC       Q(DXDACEE)
V_ACEETBL      DC       V(ACEETBL)
V_STORCB       DC       V(STORCB)
V_STORSTOR     DC       V(STORSTOR)

F0             DC       F'0'
F1             DC       F'1'

STOR_PANEL     DC       CL8'STORSTOR'

               LTORG

* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXDACEE        DSECT
               COPY     DXDPREF
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COMMON
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               SESSION  TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               BPXYSTAT DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               STORCOMM
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     OPERAND
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               IBMMAC   ASCB=YES
               IBMMAC   ASXB=YES
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               OSSPFD   TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     TRENTRY
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     REGEQU
               END      STORACEE

STORACT.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*  Module name: STORACT                                               *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*  Displays a list of currently active address spaces.                *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
STORACT  CSECT
STORACT  AMODE 31
STORACT  RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING STORCOMM,R9
         USING STORACT,R15
         USING SPACE_DSECT,R6
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'STORACT'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                  SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                          COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING STORACT,R10                      DEFINE BASE
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
INIT0010 DS    0H
         L     R15,SESS_DXD_ADDR
         A     R15,DXD_START
         ST    R13,4(,R15)
         ST    R15,8(,R13)
         LR    R13,R15
         USING DXDACT,R13
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD                 SPF DATA AREA
         USING OSSPFD,R8
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=MAIN0000
         CLI   STORCOMM_FUNCTION,$STORCOMM_FORMAT
         BE    MAIN0010                       YES
         CLI   STORCOMM_FUNCTION,$STORCOMM_COMMAND
         BE    MAIN0200                       YES
         CLI   STORCOMM_FUNCTION,$STORCOMM_CLEANUP
         BE    MAIN0500                       YES
         DC    H'0'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Build list of address spaces                                 *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0010 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=FORMAT
         ICM   R6,15,DXD_SPACE_CHAIN          ANY CHAIN NOW?
         BNZ   MAIN0100                       YES
         LA    R1,DXD_SPACE_CHAIN             RESET LAST
         ST    R1,DXD_LAST_SPACE              SPACE ON CHAIN
         L     R1,CVTPTR                      CVT ADDRESS
         USING CVT,R1                         DEFINE BASE
         L     R1,CVTASVT                     ASVT ADDRESS
         USING ASVT,R1
         LA    R2,ASVTFRST                    FIRST ASVT ENTRY
         L     R3,ASVTMAXU                    NBR OF SPACES
         SLL   R3,2                           MULTIPLY BY 4
         AR    R3,R2                          ADDR OF LAST ENTRY
         ITRACE ID=1ST_LAST,                                           +
               RDATA1=R2,                                              +
               RDATA2=R3
MAIN0020 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=A/S,                                                +
               RDATA1=R2,                                              +
               DATA2=(0(R2),4)
         ICM   R4,15,0(R2)                    ASCB ADDRESS
         BM    MAIN0040                       NEGATIVE.. NOT IN USE
         USING ASCB,R4
         ICM   R5,15,ASCBJBNI                 JOB NAME?
         BNZ   MAIN0030                       YES
         ICM   R5,15,ASCBJBNS                 JOB NAME?
         BZ    MAIN0040
MAIN0030 DS    0H
         GETMAIN RU,                                                   +
               LV=SPACE_L,                                             +
               LOC=ANY
         LR    R6,R1                          COPY ADDR
         ITRACE ID=SPACE,                                              +
               RDATA1=R6
         XC    SPACE_DSECT(SPACE_L),SPACE_DSECT
         L     R1,DXD_LAST_SPACE              LAST ON CHAIN
LAST     USING SPACE_DSECT,R1
         ST    R6,LAST.SPACE_NEXT             CHAIN TO LAST BLOCK
         DROP  LAST
         ST    R1,SPACE_PREV
         ST    R4,SPACE_ASCB                  SAVE ASCB ADDRESS
         MVC   SPACE_NAME,0(R5)               COPY SPACE NAME
         MVC   SPACE_ASID,ASCBASID            COPY ASID
         ST    R6,DXD_LAST_SPACE
MAIN0040 DS    0H
         CR    R2,R3                          AT LAST IN ASVT?
         BE    MAIN0050                       YES
         LA    R2,4(,R2)                      NEXT IN ASVT
         B     MAIN0020
MAIN0050 DS    0H
         MVC   DXD_DISPLAY_FIRST,DXD_SPACE_CHAIN
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Display address spaces                                       *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0100 DS    0H
         L     R0,STORCOMM_VDATA_ADDR
         L     R1,STORCOMM_VDATA_LENGTH
         SR    R14,R14
         SR    R15,R15
         MVCL  R0,R14                         INITIALIZE VDATA
         MVC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,PANEL_NAME
         L     R7,STORCOMM_VDATA_ADDR         VDATA ADDRESS
         L     R5,STORCOMM_VDEPTH             NBR OF LINES
         ICM   R6,15,DXD_DISPLAY_FIRST        FIRST SPACE TO DISPLAY
MAIN0110 DS    0H
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R7),MSG01
V        USING MSG01,R7
         MVC   V.MSG01_NAME,SPACE_NAME        COPY SPACE NAME
         MVC   DXD_UNPACK1(2),SPACE_ASID      COPY SPACE ID
         UNPK  DXD_UNPACK2(5),DXD_UNPACK1(3)  UNPACK A/S ID
         MVC   V.MSG01_ASID,DXD_UNPACK2       COPY ADDRESS SPACE ID
         TR    V.MSG01_ASID,COMM_HEXCHAR      TRANSLATE
         UNPK  DXD_UNPACK1(9),SPACE_ASCB(5)   UNPACK ASCB ADDR
         MVC   V.MSG01_ASCB,DXD_UNPACK1       COPY TO VDATA BUFFER
         TR    V.MSG01_ASCB,COMM_HEXCHAR      TRANSLATE TO PRINTABLE
         A     R7,STORCOMM_VWIDTH             NEXT LINE
         BCT   R5,MAIN0120                    NEXT ADDRESS SPACE
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_OK   SET STATUS
         B     EXIT0000                       SCREEN FULL
MAIN0120 DS    0H
         ICM   R6,15,SPACE_NEXT               ANOTHER ADDRESS SPACE?
         BNZ   MAIN0110                       YES..
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_OK   SET STATUS
         B     EXIT0000                       NO FURTHER DATA
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Check for line command(s)                                    *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0200 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=CMDS
         L     R7,STORCOMM_VDATA_ADDR         VDATA BUFFER
         L     R5,STORCOMM_VDEPTH             NBR OF LINES
         ICM   R6,15,DXD_DISPLAY_FIRST        FIRST A/S ON DISPLAY
MAIN0210 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=LINE_CMD,                                           +
               DATA1=V.MSG01_NAME,                                     +
               DATA2=(V.MSG01_SELECTION,1)
         OI    V.MSG01_SELECTION,C' '
         CLI   V.MSG01_SELECTION,C'A'         GO TO ASCB?
         BE    MAIN0220                       YES
         CLI   V.MSG01_SELECTION,C'E'         GO TO ACEE?
         BE    MAIN0240                       YES
         CLI   V.MSG01_SELECTION,C'T'         GO TO TASK LIST?
         BE    MAIN0250                       YES
         CLI   V.MSG01_SELECTION,C'X'         GO TO ASXB?
         BE    MAIN0230                       YES
         CLI   V.MSG01_SELECTION,C' '         BLANK?
         BE    MAIN0320                       YES
         ITRACE ID=SELECTED,                                           +
               DATA1=SPACE_NAME,                                       +
               DATA2=(SPACE_ASID,2)
         OI    DXD_FLAGS,$LINE_CMD            LINE COMMAND FOUND
         MVC   STORCOMM_SPACE_NAME,SPACE_NAME COPY SPACE NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_ASCB,SPACE_ASCB       COPY ADDRESS ASCB ADDR
         MVC   STORCOMM_ASID,SPACE_ASID       COPY ADDRESS SPACE ID
         MVC   STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,SPACE_ASCB  COPY ADDRESS OF ASCB
         XC    STORCOMM_DATA_DISP,STORCOMM_DATA_DISP
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORSTOR
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_NEW  SET STATUS
         B     EXIT0000
MAIN0220 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=ASCB
         MVC   STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,SPACE_ASCB  COPY ADDRESS OF ASCB
         L     R1,V_ASCBTBL                   FORMATTING INFO TABLE
         B     MAIN0300
MAIN0230 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=ASXB
         L     R4,SPACE_ASCB                  ASCB'S ADDRESS
         MVC   STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,ASCBASXB    SET DATA ADDRESS
         L     R1,V_ASXBTBL                   FORMATTING INFO TABLE
         B     MAIN0300
MAIN0240 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=ACEE
         OI    COMM_FLAGS,$COMM_AUTH_ON
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                        TURN ON APF AUTH
         MODESET KEY=ZERO
         L     R4,SPACE_ASCB                  ADDRESS SPACE'S ASCB
         LH    R1,ASCBASID                    SPACE'S ASID
         ITRACE ID=SSAR,                                               +
               RDATA1=R1
         SSAR  (R1)
         LAM   R4,R4,F1
         SAC   512
         L     R4,ASCBASXB                    ASXB ADDRESS
         USING ASXB,R4
         MVC   STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,ASXBSENV    SET DATA ADDRESS
         SAC   0                              RETURN TO NON-AR MODE
         LAM   R4,R4,F0                       RESET AR
         EPAR  (R1)                           OUR AX ID
         ITRACE ID=RESET,                                              +
               RDATA1=R1
         SSAR  (R1)                           RESET SECONDARY
         MODESET KEY=NZERO
         NI    COMM_FLAGS,255-$COMM_AUTH_ON
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                        TURN OFF APF AUTH
         L     R1,V_ACEETBL                   FORMATTING INFO TABLE
         B     MAIN0300
MAIN0250 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=TASK
         MVC   STORCOMM_SPACE_NAME,SPACE_NAME COPY SPACE NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_ASCB,SPACE_ASCB       COPY ADDRESS ASCB ADDR
         MVC   STORCOMM_ASID,SPACE_ASID       COPY ADDRESS SPACE ID
         XC    STORCOMM_DATA_DISP,STORCOMM_DATA_DISP
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,COMM_BLANKS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,COMM_BLANKS
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORTASK
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_NEW  SET STATUS
         B     EXIT0000
MAIN0300 DS    0H
         MVC   STORCOMM_SPACE_NAME,SPACE_NAME COPY SPACE NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_ASCB,SPACE_ASCB       COPY ADDRESS ASCB ADDR
         MVC   STORCOMM_ASID,SPACE_ASID       COPY ADDRESS SPACE ID
         XC    STORCOMM_DATA_DISP,STORCOMM_DATA_DISP
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORCB
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE           SET TABLE ADDRESS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,0(R1)         COPY CB NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,8(R1)  COPY CB DESC
         MVC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,48(R1)         COPY PANEL NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_PANEL_NAME,48(R1)     COPY PANEL NAME
         LA    R1,56(,R1)                     FIRST FIELD
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST           SET ADDRESS
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_NEW  SET STATUS
         B     EXIT0000
MAIN0320 DS    0H
         A     R7,STORCOMM_VWIDTH             NEXT LINE
         BCT   R5,MAIN0330
         B     MAIN0340
MAIN0330 DS    0H
         ICM   R6,15,SPACE_NEXT               ANOTHER ADDRESS SPACE?
         BNZ   MAIN0210                       YES
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Check for scroll command                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0340 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=SCROLL,                                             +
               DATA1=(SPF_ZVERB,1),                                    +
               DATA2=(SPF_ZSCROLLN,4)
         CLI   SPF_ZVERB,C'B'                 BOTTOM?
         BE    MAIN0370                       YES
         CLI   SPF_ZVERB,C'D'                 DOWN?
         BE    MAIN0350                       YES
         CLI   SPF_ZVERB,C'T'                 TOP?
         BE    MAIN0390                       YES
         CLI   SPF_ZVERB,C'U'                 UP?
         BE    MAIN0400                       YES
         CLC   =C'?? ',SPF_ZCMD               LIST COMMANDS?
         BNE   MAIN0420                       NO.. GIVE UP
         LA    R0,COMMAND_TABLE
         ST    R0,COMM_MAIN_COMMAND_TABLE
         XC    COMM_SUB_COMMAND_TABLE,COMM_SUB_COMMAND_TABLE
         MVI   SESS_COMMAND_FLAGS,$SESS_COMMAND_DISPLAY
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSCMD
         BALR  R14,R15                        DISPLAY COMMANDS
         B     MAIN0420
MAIN0350 DS    0H
         CLI   SPF_ZSCROLLA,C'M'              MAX?
         BE    MAIN0370                       YES.. BOTTOM
         L     R1,SPF_ZSCROLLN                NBR OF LINES
         L     R6,DXD_DISPLAY_FIRST           FIRST ON DISPLAY
MAIN0360 DS    0H
         ST    R6,DXD_DISPLAY_FIRST           SAVE FOR FIRST
         ICM   R6,15,SPACE_NEXT               NEXT ADDRESS SPACE
         BZ    MAIN0420
         BCT   R1,MAIN0360                    LOOP
         B     MAIN0420
MAIN0370 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=BOTTOM
         L     R6,DXD_DISPLAY_FIRST           FIRST ON DISPLAY
MAIN0380 DS    0H
         ST    R6,DXD_DISPLAY_FIRST
         ICM   R6,15,SPACE_NEXT               NEXT ADDRESS SPACE
         BNZ   MAIN0380
         B     MAIN0420
MAIN0390 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=TOP
         MVC   DXD_DISPLAY_FIRST,DXD_SPACE_CHAIN
         B     MAIN0420
MAIN0400 DS    0H
         CLI   SPF_ZSCROLLA,C'M'              MAX?
         BE    MAIN0390                       YES.. TOP
         ITRACE ID=UP
         L     R1,SPF_ZSCROLLN                NBR OF LINES
         L     R6,DXD_DISPLAY_FIRST
MAIN0410 DS    0H
         ST    R6,DXD_DISPLAY_FIRST
         C     R6,DXD_SPACE_CHAIN             AT FIRST ON CHAIN?
         BE    MAIN0420                       YES
         ICM   R6,15,SPACE_PREV               PREVIOUS ADDRESS SPACE?
         BZ    MAIN0420                       NO
         BCT   R1,MAIN0410                    LOOP
MAIN0420 DS    0H
         MVC   SPF_ZCMD,COMM_BLANKS
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_OK   SET STATUS
         B     EXIT0000                       EXIT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0500 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=CLEAN_UP
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_OK   SET STATUS
         ICM   R6,15,DXD_SPACE_CHAIN          FIRST ADDRESS SPACE
         BZ    EXIT0000                       NOTHING ON CHAIN
MAIN0510 DS    0H
         LR    R1,R6                          COPY ADDRESS
         ITRACE ID=FREE,                                               +
               RDATA1=R1
         L     R6,SPACE_NEXT                  NEXT SPACE ON CHAIN
         FREEMAIN RU,                                                  +
               A=(1),                                                  +
               LV=SPACE_L
         LTR   R6,R6                          ANOTHER SPACE?
         BNZ   MAIN0510                       YES
         XC    DXD_SPACE_CHAIN,DXD_SPACE_CHAIN
         XC    DXD_DISPLAY_FIRST,DXD_DISPLAY_FIRST
         XC    DXD_LAST_SPACE,DXD_LAST_SPACE
         B     EXIT0000
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
ERR0010  DS    0H
         MVI   COMM_MSG_ID,0
         MVC   COMM_MSG_CSECT,MODID
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSMSG
         BALR  R14,R15
         MVC   SPF_MSG_1,COMM_MSG_1           COPY MESSAGE
         MVC   SPF_MSG_2,COMM_MSG_2           COPY MESSAGE
         MVC   SPF_MSG_3,COMM_MSG_3           COPY MESSAGE
         MVC   SPF_MSG_4,COMM_MSG_4           COPY MESSAGE
         MVC   SPF_MSG_5,COMM_MSG_5           COPY MESSAGE
         B     EXIT0000
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
EXIT0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=EXIT
         LH    R15,DXD_RC                     RETURN CODE
         L     R13,4(,R13)                    RESTORE R13
         L     R14,12(,R13)                   RESTORE R14
         LM    R0,R12,20(R13)                 RESTORE REGISTERS
         BR    R14                            RETURN
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START       DC       Q(DXDACT)
V_STORCB        DC       V(STORCB)
V_STORSTOR      DC       V(STORSTOR)
V_STORTASK      DC       V(STORTASK)
V_ASCBTBL       DC       V(ASCBTBL)
V_ASXBTBL       DC       V(ASXBTBL)
V_ACEETBL       DC       V(ACEETBL)

F0              DC       F'0'
F1              DC       F'1'

PANEL_NAME      DC       CL8'STORACT'

MSG01           DS       0C
                DC       CL20' '
MSG01_ATTR1     DC       AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_INPUT)
MSG01_SELECTION DC       C' '
MSG01_ATTR2     DC       AL2($SCREEN_ATTR_NORMAL)
MSG01_NAME      DC       CL8' '
                DC       CL8' '
MSG01_ASID      DC       CL4' '
                DC       CL8' '
MSG01_ASCB      DC       CL8' '
MSG01_L         EQU      *-MSG01
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*               LOCAL COMMANDS                                        *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
COMMAND_TABLE   DS       0C
                CMD      A,0,'Display ASCB for the address space'
                CMD      E,0,'Display ACEE for the address space'
                CMD      S,0,'Display storage in the address space'
                CMD      T,0,'Display tasks in the address space'
                CMD      X,0,'Display ASXB for the address space'
                DC       X'FF'

                LTORG
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXDACT            DSECT
                  COPY   DXDPREF

DXD_SPACE_CHAIN   DS     A                    FIRST ON CHAIN
                  DS     A                    ALWAYS ZERO

DXD_LAST_SPACE    DS     A

DXD_DISPLAY_FIRST DS     A

DXD_RC            DS     H

DXD_UNPACK1       DS     XL10
DXD_UNPACK2       DS     XL10

DXD_FLAGS         DS     X
$LINE_CMD         EQU    X'80'                LINE COMMAND(S) PRESENT

* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
SPACE_DSECT       DSECT
SPACE_NEXT        DS       A
SPACE_PREV        DS       A
SPACE_ASCB        DS       A
SPACE_NAME        DS       CL8
SPACE_ASID        DS       XL2
SPACE_L           EQU      *-SPACE_DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  COMMON
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  SESSION  TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  IBMMAC   CVT=YES
                  IBMMAC   ASCB=LIST
                  IBMMAC   ASXB=YES
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  BPXYSTAT DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  IHAASVT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  STORCOMM
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  OSSPFD   TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  COPY     TRENTRY
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  COPY     ATTRS
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
                  COPY     REGEQU
                  END      STORACT

STORADDR.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*  Process new addresses entered as primary command                   *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
STORADDR CSECT
STORADDR AMODE 31
STORADDR RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING STORCOMM,R9
         USING STORADDR,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'STORADDR'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                        COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING STORADDR,R10                   DEFINE BASE
         L     R1,SESS_DXD_ADDR
         A     R1,DXD_START
         ST    R1,8(,R13)
         ST    R13,4(,R1)
         LR    R13,R1
         USING DXDADDR,R13
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8
         ICM   R1,15,OPERAND_01_ADDRESS       OPERAND'S ADDRESS
         BZ    EXIT0008                       NOT PRESENT
         SR    R2,R2
         ICM   R2,3,OPERAND_01_LENGTH         OPERAND LENGTH
         CH    R2,H8                          TOO LONG?
         BH    EXIT0008                       YES
         ITRACE ID=CHEKADDR,                                           +
               RDATA1=R1,                                              +
               RDATA2=R2
INIT0010 DS    0H
         CLI   0(R1),C'A'                     VALID?
         BL    EXIT0008                       NO
         CLI   0(R1),C'G'                     VALID?
         BL    INIT0020                       YES
         CLI   0(R1),C'0'                     VALID?
         BL    EXIT0008                       NO
         CLI   0(R1),C'9'                     VALID?
         BH    EXIT0008                       NO
INIT0020 DS    0H
         LA    R1,1(,R1)                      NEXT
         BCT   R2,INIT0010                    LOOP
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Operand is valid.  Assume it is an address.                  *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         ICM   R1,15,OPERAND_01_ADDRESS       OPERAND'S ADDRESS
         XC    COMM_INFO_01(8),COMM_INFO_01
         CLI   OPERAND_01_LENGTH+1,1          1 BYTE?
         BE    MAIN0010                       YES
         CLI   OPERAND_01_LENGTH+1,2          2 BYTES?
         BE    MAIN0020                       YES
         CLI   OPERAND_01_LENGTH+1,3          3 BYTES?
         BE    MAIN0030                       YES
         CLI   OPERAND_01_LENGTH+1,4          4 BYTES?
         BE    MAIN0040                       YES
         CLI   OPERAND_01_LENGTH+1,5          5 BYTES?
         BE    MAIN0050                       YES
         CLI   OPERAND_01_LENGTH+1,6          6 BYTES?
         BE    MAIN0060                       YES
         CLI   OPERAND_01_LENGTH+1,7          7 BYTES?
         BE    MAIN0070                       YES
         MVC   COMM_INFO_01+0(8),0(R1)        COPY TO WORK AREA
         B     MAIN0080
MAIN0010 DS    0H
         MVC   COMM_INFO_01+7(1),0(R1)        COPY TO WORK AREA
         B     MAIN0080
MAIN0020 DS    0H
         MVC   COMM_INFO_01+6(2),0(R1)        COPY TO WORK AREA
         B     MAIN0080
MAIN0030 DS    0H
         MVC   COMM_INFO_01+5(3),0(R1)        COPY TO WORK AREA
         B     MAIN0080
MAIN0040 DS    0H
         MVC   COMM_INFO_01+4(4),0(R1)        COPY TO WORK AREA
         B     MAIN0080
MAIN0050 DS    0H
         MVC   COMM_INFO_01+3(5),0(R1)        COPY TO WORK AREA
         B     MAIN0080
MAIN0060 DS    0H
         MVC   COMM_INFO_01+2(8),0(R1)        COPY TO WORK AREA
         B     MAIN0080
MAIN0070 DS    0H
         MVC   COMM_INFO_01+1(7),0(R1)        COPY TO WORK AREA
MAIN0080 DS    0H
         TR    COMM_INFO_01(8),CHARHEX
         PACK  COMM_DWORD(5),COMM_INFO_01(9)  PACK IT
         MVC   STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,COMM_DWORD
         XC    STORCOMM_DATA_DISP,STORCOMM_DATA_DISP
         NI    STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR+3,X'FC'     FORCE FULLWORD BOUNDARY
         ITRACE ID=NEW_ADDR,                                           +
               DATA1=(STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,4)
         MVC   STORCOMM_NEW_FUNCTION,V_STORSTOR
         MVC   SPF_ZCMD,COMM_BLANKS
         SR    R15,R15                        SET RC
         B     EXITEXIT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
EXIT0008 DS    0H
         LA    R15,8
EXITEXIT DS    0H
