         ITRACE ID=EXIT,                                               +
               RDATA1=R15
         L     R13,4(,R13)                     RESTORE R13
         L     R14,12(,R13)                    RESTORE R14
         LM    R0,R12,20(R13)                  RESTORE REGISTERS
         BR    R14                             RETURN
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START      DC       Q(DXDADDR)
V_STORSTOR     DC       V(STORSTOR)
H8             DC       H'8'

CHARHEX        DC       256C' '
               ORG      CHARHEX+C'A'
               DC       X'0A0B0C0D0E0F'
               ORG      CHARHEX+C'0'
               DC       X'00010203040506070809'
               ORG      CHARHEX+256

               LTORG

* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXDADDR        DSECT
               COPY     DXDPREF
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COMMON
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               SESSION  TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               BPXYSTAT DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               STORCOMM
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               OSSPFD   TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     TRENTRY
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     REGEQU
               END      STORADDR

STORASCB.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*  Module name: STORASCB                                              *
*                                                                     *
*  Set current address to selected address space's ASCB               *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
STORASCB CSECT
STORASCB AMODE 31
STORASCB RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING STORASCB,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'STORASCB'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                 SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                         COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING STORASCB,R10                    DEFINE BASE
         USING STORCOMM,R9                     DEFINE BASE
         L     R15,SESS_DXD_ADDR               WORK AREA BASE
         A     R15,DXD_START                   PLUS DISP
         ST    R13,4(,R15)                     SAVE R13
         ST    R15,8(,R13)                     CHAIN SAVE AREA
         LR    R13,R15
         USING DXDASCB,R13                     DEFINE WORK AREA BASE
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8
         MVC   SPF_ZCMD,COMM_BLANKS
         MVC   STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,STORCOMM_ASCB
         ITRACE ID=ASCB,                                               +
               DATA1=(STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,4)
         XC    STORCOMM_DATA_DISP,STORCOMM_DATA_DISP
         CLC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,STOR_PANEL
         BE    ASCB0010
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORCB
         L     R1,V_ASCBTBL                    FORMATTING INFO TABLE
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE            SET ADDRESS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,0(R1)          COPY CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,8(R1)   COPY CONTROL BLOCK DESC
         MVC   STORCOMM_PANEL_NAME,48(R1)      COPY PANEL NAME
         MVC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,48(R1)
         LA    R1,56(,R1)                      FIRST FIELD
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST            SET ADDRESS
         B     EXIT0000
ASCB0010 DS    0H
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORSTOR
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,COMM_BLANKS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,COMM_BLANKS
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_TABLE,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_FIRST,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_LAST,STORCOMM_CB_LAST
EXIT0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=EXIT
         L     R13,4(,R13)                     RESTORE R13
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)                 RESTORE REGISTERS
         SR    R15,R15                         SET RC
         BR    R14
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START      DC       Q(DXDASCB)
V_ASCBTBL      DC       V(ASCBTBL)
V_STORCB       DC       V(STORCB)
V_STORSTOR     DC       V(STORSTOR)

STOR_PANEL     DC       CL8'STORSTOR'

               LTORG

* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXDASCB        DSECT
               COPY     DXDPREF
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COMMON
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               SESSION  TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               BPXYSTAT DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               STORCOMM
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     OPERAND
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               OSSPFD   TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     TRENTRY
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     REGEQU
               END      STORASCB

STORASID.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*  Module name: STORASID                                              *
*                                                                     *
*  Set current address to selected address space's ASID               *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
STORASID CSECT
STORASID AMODE 31
STORASID RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING STORASID,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'STORASID'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                        COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING STORASID,R10                   DEFINE BASE
         USING STORCOMM,R9                    DEFINE BASE
         L     R15,SESS_DXD_ADDR              WORK AREA BASE
         A     R15,DXD_START                  PLUS DISP
         ST    R13,4(,R15)                    SAVE R13
         ST    R15,8(,R13)                    CHAIN SAVE AREA
         LR    R13,R15
         USING DXDASID,R13                    DEFINE WORK AREA BASE
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORSTOR
ASID0000 DS    0H
         CLC   OPERAND_02_LENGTH,H4           CORRECT LENGTH
         BNE   ERR0010                        NO
         ICM   R1,15,OPERAND_02_ADDRESS       ASID ADDRESS
         LA    R2,4                           LENGTH
         BAL   R7,HEX0000                     VERIFY HEX
         ICM   R1,15,OPERAND_02_ADDRESS       OPERAND ADDRESS
         TR    0(4,R1),CHARHEX                PREPARE FOR PACKING
         PACK  COMM_DWORD(3),0(5,R1)          PACK SPECIFIED ASID
         ITRACE ID=NEW_ASID,                                           +
               DATA1=(COMM_DWORD,2)
         L     R1,CVTPTR                      CVT ADDRESS
         USING CVT,R1                         DEFINE BASE
         L     R1,CVTASVT                     ASVT ADDRESS
         USING ASVT,R1
         CLC   COMM_DWORD(2),ASVTMAXU+2       TOO HIGH?
         BH    ERR0020                        YES
         SR    R2,R2                          CLEAR REGISTER
         ICM   R2,3,COMM_DWORD                ASID
         SLL   R2,2                           MULTIPLY BY 4
         LA    R2,ASVTFRST(R2)                PLUS ADDR OF FIRST ENTRY
         ICM   R5,15,0(R2)                    ADDR OF ASCB
         BM    ERR0030                        NOT IN USE
         USING ASCB,R5
         ITRACE ID=ASCB,                                               +
               RDATA1=R5,                                              +
               DATA2=(ASCBASID,4)
         MVC   SPF_ZCMD,COMM_BLANKS
         ST    R5,STORCOMM_ASCB               SAVE ASCB ADDRESS
         ST    R5,STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR          SET DATA ADDRESS
         MVC   STORCOMM_ASID,ASCBASID         SAVE ASID
         ICM   R1,15,ASCBJBNI                 JOB NAME?
         BNZ   ASID0040                       NO
         ICM   R1,15,ASCBJBNS                 OTHER JOB NAME
ASID0040 DS    0H
         MVC   STORCOMM_SPACE_NAME,0(R1)      SAVE JOB NAME
         MVC   SPF_SPACE_NAME,0(R1)           SAVE JOB NAME
         UNPK  COMM_DWORD(5),STORCOMM_ASID(3)
         MVC   SPF_SPACE_ASID,COMM_DWORD
         TR    SPF_SPACE_ASID,COMM_HEXCHAR
         XC    STORCOMM_DATA_DISP,STORCOMM_DATA_DISP
         CLC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,STOR_PANEL
         BE    ASID0050
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORCB
         L     R1,V_ASCBTBL                   FORMATTING CONTROL INFO
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE           SET ADDRESS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,0(R1)         COPY CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,8(R1)  COPY CONTROL BLOCK DESC
         MVC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,48(R1)         COPY PANEL NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_PANEL_NAME,48(R1)
         LA    R1,56(,R1)                     FIRST FIELD
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST           SET ADDRESS
         B     EXIT0000
ASID0050 DS    0H
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,COMM_BLANKS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,COMM_BLANKS
         B     EXIT0000
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*        VERIFY A CHARACTER STRING IS ALL VALID HEX CHARACTERS.       *
*                                                                     *
*        R1  ADDRESS OF CHARACTER STRING                              *
*        R2  LENGTH OF STRING                                         *
*        R7  RETURN ADDRESS                                           *
*                                                                     *
*        IF THE STRING IS NOT ALL HEX, CONTROL IS NOT RETURNED        *
*        TO THE CALLER.                                               *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
HEX0000  DS    0H
         CLI   0(R1),C'A'                      VALID?
         BL    ERR0040                         NO
         CLI   0(R1),C'G'                      VALID?
         BL    HEX0010                         YES
         CLI   0(R1),C'0'                      VALID?
         BL    ERR0040                         NO
         CLI   0(R1),C'9'                      VALID?
         BH    ERR0040                         NO
HEX0010  DS    0H
         LA    R1,1(,R1)                       NEXT
         BCT   R2,HEX0000                      LOOP
         BR    R7                              RETURN.. ALL VALID
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
ERR0010  DS    0H
         MVC   SPF_MSG_1(MSG01_L),MSG01
         B     EXIT0000
ERR0020  DS    0H
         MVC   SPF_MSG_1(MSG02_L),MSG02
         B     EXIT0000
ERR0030  DS    0H
         MVC   SPF_MSG_1(MSG03_L),MSG03
         B     EXIT0000
ERR0040  DS    0H
         MVC   SPF_MSG_1(MSG04_L),MSG04
         B     EXIT0000
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
EXIT0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=EXIT
         L     R13,4(,R13)                     RESTORE R13
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)                 RESTORE REGISTERS
         SR    R15,R15                         SET RC
         BR    R14
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START      DC       Q(DXDASID)
V_ASCBTBL      DC       V(ASCBTBL)
V_STORCB       DC       V(STORCB)
V_STORSTOR     DC       V(STORSTOR)

H4             DC       H'4'

CB_ASCB        DC       CL8'ASCB'
ASCB_PANEL     DC       CL8'STORASCB'
STOR_PANEL     DC       CL8'STORSTOR'

CHARHEX        DC       256C' '
               ORG      CHARHEX+C'A'
               DC       X'0A0B0C0D0E0F'
               ORG      CHARHEX+C'0'
               DC       X'00010203040506070809'
               ORG      CHARHEX+256

MSG01          DS       0C
               DC       C'STORASID01E '
               DC       C'ASID must be four characters'
MSG01_L        EQU      *-MSG01

MSG02          DS       0C
               DC       C'STORASID02E '
               DC       C'ASID too high'
MSG02_L        EQU      *-MSG02

MSG03          DS       0C
               DC       C'STORASID03E '
               DC       C'ASID is not active'
MSG03_L        EQU      *-MSG03

MSG04          DS       0C
               DC       C'STORASIDXXE '
               DC       C'Invalid hex digit'
MSG04_L        EQU      *-MSG04

               LTORG

* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXDASID        DSECT
               COPY     DXDPREF
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COMMON
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               SESSION  TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               BPXYSTAT DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               STORCOMM
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               IBMMAC   CVT=YES
               IBMMAC   ASCB=YES
               IHAASVT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     OPERAND
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               OSSPFD   TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     TRENTRY
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     REGEQU
               END      STORASID

STORASSB.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*  Module name: STORASSB                                              *
*                                                                     *
*  Set current address to selected address space's ASSB               *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
STORASSB CSECT
STORASSB AMODE 31
STORASSB RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING STORASSB,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'STORASSB'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                 SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                         COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING STORASSB,R10                    DEFINE BASE
         USING STORCOMM,R9                     DEFINE BASE
         L     R15,SESS_DXD_ADDR               WORK AREA BASE
         A     R15,DXD_START                   PLUS DISP
         ST    R13,4(,R15)                     SAVE R13
         ST    R15,8(,R13)                     CHAIN SAVE AREA
         LR    R13,R15
         USING DXDASSB,R13                     DEFINE WORK AREA BASE
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8
         MVC   SPF_ZCMD,COMM_BLANKS
         OI    COMM_FLAGS,$COMM_AUTH_ON
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                         TURN ON APF AUTH
         MODESET KEY=ZERO
         LH    R1,STORCOMM_ASID
         ITRACE ID=SSAR,                                               +
               RDATA1=R1
         SSAR  (R1)
         LAM   R5,R5,F1                        SET AR
         SAC   512                             ENTER AR MODE
         L     R5,STORCOMM_ASCB                ASCB ADDRESS
         USING ASCB,R5
         MVC   STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,ASCBASSB     ASSB ADDRESS
         EPAR  (R1)
         ITRACE ID=RESET,                                              +
               RDATA1=R1
         SSAR  (R1)
         SAC   0                               TURN OFF AR MODE
         LAM   R5,R5,F0                        RESET AR
         MODESET KEY=NZERO                     REQUEST NORMAL KEY
         NI    COMM_FLAGS,255-$COMM_AUTH_ON
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                         TURN OFF APF AUTH
         ITRACE ID=ASSBADDR,                                           +
               DATA1=(STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,4)
         XC    STORCOMM_DATA_DISP,STORCOMM_DATA_DISP
         CLC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,STOR_PANEL
         BE    ASSB0010
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORCB
         L     R1,V_ASSBTBL                    FORMATTING INFO TABLE
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE            SET ADDRESS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,0(R1)          COPY CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,8(R1)   COPY CONTROL BLOCK DESC
         MVC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,48(R1)          COPY PANEL NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_PANEL_NAME,48(R1)      COPY PANEL NAME
         LA    R1,56(,R1)                      FIRST FIELD
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST            SET ADDRESS
         B     EXIT0000
ASSB0010 DS    0H
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORSTOR
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,COMM_BLANKS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,COMM_BLANKS
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_TABLE,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_FIRST,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_LAST,STORCOMM_CB_LAST
EXIT0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=EXIT
         L     R13,4(,R13)                     RESTORE R13
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)                 RESTORE REGISTERS
         SR    R15,R15                         SET RC
         BR    R14
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START      DC       Q(DXDASSB)
V_ASSBTBL      DC       V(ASSBTBL)
V_STORCB       DC       V(STORCB)
V_STORSTOR     DC       V(STORSTOR)

F0             DC       F'0'
F1             DC       F'1'

STOR_PANEL     DC       CL8'STORSTOR'

               LTORG

* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXDASSB        DSECT
               COPY     DXDPREF
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COMMON
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               SESSION  TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               BPXYSTAT DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               STORCOMM
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     OPERAND
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               IBMMAC   ASCB=YES
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               OSSPFD   TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     TRENTRY
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     REGEQU
               END      STORASSB

STORASXB.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*  Module name: STORASXB                                              *
*                                                                     *
*  Set current address to selected address space's ASXB               *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
STORASXB CSECT
STORASXB AMODE 31
STORASXB RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING STORASXB,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'STORASXB'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                 SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                         COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING STORASXB,R10                    DEFINE BASE
         USING STORCOMM,R9                     DEFINE BASE
         L     R15,SESS_DXD_ADDR               WORK AREA BASE
         A     R15,DXD_START                   PLUS DISP
         ST    R13,4(,R15)                     SAVE R13
         ST    R15,8(,R13)                     CHAIN SAVE AREA
         LR    R13,R15
         USING DXDASXB,R13                     DEFINE WORK AREA BASE
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8
         MVC   SPF_ZCMD,COMM_BLANKS
         L     R5,STORCOMM_ASCB                ASCB ADDRESS
         USING ASCB,R5
         CLC   ASCBASCB,C_ASCB                 ASCB LOOK OK?
         BNE   ERR0010                         NO
         MVC   STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,ASCBASXB     ASXB ADDRESS
         ITRACE ID=ASXBADDR,                                           +
               DATA1=(STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,4)
         XC    STORCOMM_DATA_DISP,STORCOMM_DATA_DISP
         CLC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,STOR_PANEL
         BE    ASXB0010
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORCB
         L     R1,V_ASXBTBL                    FORMATTING INFO TABLE
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE            SET ADRESS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,0(R1)          COPY CB NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,8(R1)   COPY CB DESCRIPTION
         MVC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,48(R1)          COPY PANEL NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_PANEL_NAME,48(R1)      COPY PANEL NAME
         LA    R1,56(,R1)                      FIRST FIELD
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST            SET ADDRES
         B     EXIT0000
ASXB0010 DS    0H
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORSTOR
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,COMM_BLANKS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,COMM_BLANKS
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_TABLE,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_FIRST,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_LAST,STORCOMM_CB_LAST
         B     EXIT0000
ERR0010  DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=BAD_ASCB,                                           +
               RDATA1=R5
         DC    H'0'
EXIT0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=EXIT
         L     R13,4(,R13)                     RESTORE R13
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)                 RESTORE REGISTERS
         SR    R15,R15                         SET RC
         BR    R14
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START      DC       Q(DXDASXB)
V_ASXBTBL      DC       V(ASXBTBL)
V_STORCB       DC       V(STORCB)
V_STORSTOR     DC       V(STORSTOR)

C_ASCB         DC       CL4'ASCB'
STOR_PANEL     DC       CL8'STORSTOR'

               LTORG

* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXDASXB        DSECT
               COPY     DXDPREF
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COMMON
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               SESSION  TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               BPXYSTAT DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               STORCOMM
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     OPERAND
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               IBMMAC   ASCB=YES
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               OSSPFD   TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     TRENTRY
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     REGEQU
               END      STORASXB

STORBASE.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*  Module name: STORBASE                                              *
*                                                                     *
*  Set current address to master scheduler's resident data area       *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
STORBASE CSECT
STORBASE AMODE 31
STORBASE RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING STORBASE,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'STORBASE'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                 SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                         COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING STORBASE,R10                    DEFINE BASE
         USING STORCOMM,R9                     DEFINE BASE
         L     R15,SESS_DXD_ADDR               WORK AREA BASE
         A     R15,DXD_START                   PLUS DISP
         ST    R13,4(,R15)                     SAVE R13
         ST    R15,8(,R13)                     CHAIN SAVE AREA
         LR    R13,R15
         USING DXDBASE,R13                     DEFINE WORK AREA BASE
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8
         MVC   SPF_ZCMD,COMM_BLANKS
         L     R1,CVTPTR                       CVT ADDRESS
         USING CVT,R1                          DEFINE BASE
         CLC   STORCOMM_ASID,H1               ALREADY IN MASTER A/S?
         BE    INIT0010                       YES
         MVC   STORCOMM_ASID,H1                FORCE ASID 1
         MVC   STORCOMM_SPACE_NAME,MASTER_NAME SPACE NAME IS '*MASTER*'
         L     R2,CVTASVT                      ASVT ADDRESS
         USING ASVT,R2
         MVC   STORCOMM_ASCB,ASVTFRST+4        COPY MASTER'S ASCB ADDR
         MVC   SPF_MSG_3(MSG01_L),MSG01
INIT0010 DS    0H
         MVC   STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,CVTMSER
         ITRACE ID=BASE,                                               +
               DATA1=(STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,4)
         XC    STORCOMM_DATA_DISP,STORCOMM_DATA_DISP
         CLC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,STOR_PANEL
         BE    BASE0010
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORCB
         L     R1,V_BASEATBL                   FORMATTING INFO TABLE
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE            SET ADRESS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,0(R1)          COPY CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,8(R1)   COPY CONTROL BLOCK DESC
         MVC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,48(R1)          COPY PANEL NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_PANEL_NAME,48(R1)      COPY PANEL NAME
         LA    R1,56(,R1)                      FIRST FIELD
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST            SET ADDRESS
         B     EXIT0000
BASE0010 DS    0H
         MVC   STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR,V_STORSTOR
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,COMM_BLANKS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,COMM_BLANKS
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_TABLE,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_FIRST,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST
         XC    STORCOMM_CB_LAST,STORCOMM_CB_LAST
EXIT0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=EXIT
         L     R13,4(,R13)                     RESTORE R13
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)                 RESTORE REGISTERS
         SR    R15,R15                         SET RC
         BR    R14
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START      DC       Q(DXDBASE)
V_BASEATBL     DC       V(BASEATBL)
V_STORCB       DC       V(STORCB)
V_STORSTOR     DC       V(STORSTOR)

H1             DC       H'1'

MSG01          DS       0C
               DC       C'STORBASE01I '
               DC       C'Address space forced to *MASTER*'
MSG01_L        EQU      *-MSG01

MASTER_NAME    DC       CL8'*MASTER*'
STOR_PANEL     DC       CL8'STORSTOR'

               LTORG

* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXDBASE        DSECT
               COPY     DXDPREF
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COMMON
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               SESSION  TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               IBMMAC   CVT=YES
               IBMMAC   ASCB=YES
               IHAASVT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               BPXYSTAT DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               STORCOMM
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     OPERAND
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               OSSPFD   TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     TRENTRY
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     REGEQU
               END      STORBASE

STORBOOK.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*  Process name (.), redisplay (..), and list commands                *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*  Maybe someone else can figure out a better way of wording this...  *
*                                                                     *
*  While searching storage, you can "bookmark" the current display.   *
*  That is give a name to the current address, displacment,           *
*  and if using a control block format, the format in use.  Then      *
*  later you can return to bookmarks.                                 *
*                                                                     *
*  "Bookmark" the current display, enter ".name" where the "." is a   *
*  keyword and "name" is any 1-8 character name you want to use.      *
*  To return to a bookmark, enter "..name" where ".." is a keyword    *
*  and "name" is the name used earlier on a "." command.              *
*                                                                     *
*  You can list the bookmarks you have created by entering "bookmark".*
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
STORBOOK CSECT
STORBOOK AMODE 31
STORBOOK RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING STORCOMM,R9
         USING STORBOOK,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'STORBOOK'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                        COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING STORBOOK,R10                   DEFINE BASE
         USING BOOKMARK_DSECT,R5              DEFINE BASE
         L     R1,SESS_DXD_ADDR
         A     R1,DXD_START
         ST    R1,8(,R13)
         ST    R13,4(,R1)
         LR    R13,R1
         USING DXDBOOK,R13
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8
         ICM   R1,15,OPERAND_01_ADDRESS       OPERAND'S ADDRESS
         BZ    EXIT0008                       NOT PRESENT
         SR    R2,R2
         ICM   R2,3,OPERAND_01_LENGTH         OPERAND LENGTH
         CLC   =C'..',0(R1)                   RESTORE?
         BE    MAIN0100                       YES
         CLC   =C'BOOKMARK',0(R1)             LIST BOOKMARKS?
         BE    MAIN0200                       YES
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Create or replace bookmark                                   *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         ITRACE ID=BOOKMARK
         CH    R2,H9                          TOO LONG?
         BH    ERR0010                        YES
         BCTR  R2,R0                          MINUS 1 FOR "."
         BCTR  R2,R0                          MINUS 1 FOR EX
         MVC   DXD_NAME,COMM_BLANKS           INITIALIZE NAME
         EX    R1,NAMEMVC1                    COPY NAME
         ITRACE ID=CHECKDUP
         LA    R5,STORCOMM_BOOKMARK_CHAIN     BOOKMARK CHAIN ANCHOR
         B     MAIN0020
MAIN0010 DS    0H
         CLC   BOOKMARK_NAME,DXD_NAME         ALREADY ON CHAIN?
         BE    MAIN0030                       YES
MAIN0020 DS    0H
         LR    R2,R5                          SAVE THIS BLOCK'S ADDRESS
         ICM   R5,15,BOOKMARK_NEXT            NEXT ON CHAIN
         BNZ   MAIN0010
         MVC   SPF_MSG_1(MSG05_L),MSG05
PREV     USING BOOKMARK_DSECT,R2
         GETMAIN RU,                                                   +
               LV=BOOKMARK_DSECT_L,                                    +
               LOC=ANY
         LR    R5,R1                          COPY NEW BLOCK'S ADDR
         ST    R5,PREV.BOOKMARK_NEXT          CHAIN TO PREVIOUS
         DROP  PREV
         ITRACE ID=NEW_BK,                                             +
               RDATA1=R5,                                              +
               RDATA2=R2
         B     MAIN0040
MAIN0030 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=REP_BOOK
         MVC   SPF_MSG_1(MSG02_L),MSG02
MAIN0040 DS    0H
         XC    BOOKMARK_DSECT(BOOKMARK_DSECT_L),BOOKMARK_DSECT
         MVC   BOOKMARK_NAME,DXD_NAME
         MVC   BOOKMARK_DATA_ADDR,STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR
         MVC   BOOKMARK_DATA_DISP,STORCOMM_DATA_DISP
         MVC   BOOKMARK_CB_NAME,STORCOMM_CB_NAME
         MVC   BOOKMARK_CB_DESC,STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION
         MVC   BOOKMARK_CB_TABLE,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE
         MVC   BOOKMARK_CB_FIRST,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST
         MVC   BOOKMARK_FUNCTION_ADDR,STORCOMM_FUNCTION_ADDR
         MVC   BOOKMARK_ASID,STORCOMM_ASID
         MVC   BOOKMARK_SPACE_NAME,STORCOMM_SPACE_NAME
         MVC   BOOKMARK_PANEL,SESS_DISP_PANEL
         MVC   SPF_ZCMD,COMM_BLANKS
         B     EXIT0008                       <-- NOT REALLY AN ERROR
NAMEMVC1 MVC   DXD_NAME(0),1(R1)
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Restore previously named (bookmarked) display                *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0100 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=RESTORE
         CH    R2,H10                         TOO LONG?
         BH    ERR0010                        YES
         BCTR  R2,R0                          MINUS 1 FOR 1ST "."
         BCTR  R2,R0                          MINUS 1 FOR 2ND "."
         BCTR  R2,R0                          MINUS 1 FOR EX
         MVC   DXD_NAME,COMM_BLANKS           INITIALIZE NAME
         EX    R1,NAMEMVC2                    COPY NAME
         ICM   R5,15,STORCOMM_BOOKMARK_CHAIN  1ST BOOKMARK
         BZ    ERR0020                        NO BOOKMARKS
MAIN0110 DS    0H
         CLC   BOOKMARK_NAME,DXD_NAME         BOOKMARK LOCATED?
         BE    MAIN0120                       YES
         ICM   R5,15,BOOKMARK_NEXT            NEXT BOOKMARK
         BNZ   MAIN0110                       LOOP
         B     ERR0020
MAIN0120 DS    0H
         MVC   STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,BOOKMARK_DATA_ADDR
         MVC   STORCOMM_DATA_DISP,BOOKMARK_DATA_DISP
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,BOOKMARK_CB_NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,BOOKMARK_CB_DESC
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_TABLE,BOOKMARK_CB_TABLE
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_FIRST,BOOKMARK_CB_FIRST
         MVC   STORCOMM_NEW_FUNCTION,BOOKMARK_FUNCTION_ADDR
         MVC   STORCOMM_ASID,BOOKMARK_ASID
         MVC   STORCOMM_SPACE_NAME,BOOKMARK_SPACE_NAME
         MVC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,BOOKMARK_PANEL
         MVC   SPF_ZCMD,COMM_BLANKS
         ITRACE ID=RESTORED
         B     EXIT0000
NAMEMVC2 MVC   DXD_NAME(0),2(R1)
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0200 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=LIST
         MVC   SPF_ZCMD,COMM_BLANKS
         MVC   DXD_PANEL,SESS_DISP_PANEL
         MVC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,PANEL_NAME
         MVC   DXD_FIRST_BOOKMARK,STORCOMM_BOOKMARK_CHAIN
MAIN0210 DS    0H
         L     R0,STORCOMM_VDATA_ADDR
         L     R1,STORCOMM_VDATA_LENGTH
         SR    R14,R14
         SR    R15,R15
         MVCL  R0,R14                         INITIALIZE VDATA
         L     R6,STORCOMM_VDATA_ADDR
         LH    R7,SPF_VDEPTH                  NBR OF LINES
         ICM   R5,15,DXD_FIRST_BOOKMARK       FIRST BOOKMARK
         BZ    MAIN0350
MAIN0220 DS    0H
         MVC   0(DETAIL_L,R6),DETAIL
V        USING DETAIL,R6
         MVC   V.DETAIL_NAME,BOOKMARK_NAME
         MVC   V.DETAIL_AS_NAME,BOOKMARK_SPACE_NAME
         UNPK  COMM_DWORD(5),BOOKMARK_ASID(3)
         MVC   V.DETAIL_AS_ID,COMM_DWORD
         TR    V.DETAIL_AS_ID,COMM_HEXCHAR
         UNPK  COMM_DWORD(9),BOOKMARK_DATA_ADDR(5)
         MVC   V.DETAIL_ADDR,COMM_DWORD
         TR    V.DETAIL_ADDR,COMM_HEXCHAR
         UNPK  COMM_DWORD(9),BOOKMARK_DATA_DISP(5)
         MVC   V.DETAIL_DISP,COMM_DWORD
         TR    V.DETAIL_DISP,COMM_HEXCHAR
         A     R6,SPF_VWIDTH                  NEXT LINE
         BCT   R7,MAIN0230                    ACCOUNT FOR USED LINE
         B     MAIN0240
MAIN0230 DS    0H
         ICM   R5,15,BOOKMARK_NEXT            ANOTHER BOOKMARK?
         BNZ   MAIN0220                       YES
MAIN0240 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=DISPLAY
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSDISP              OSDISP ENTRY POINT
         BALR  R14,R15                        CALL OSDISP
         OC    SESS_RC,SESS_RC                RC = 0?
         BNZ   MAIN0400                       NO
         CLI   SPF_ZVERB,C'D'                 SCROLL DOWN?
         BE    MAIN0250                       YES
         CLI   SPF_ZVERB,C'U'                 SCROLL UP?
         BE    MAIN0300
         B     MAIN0240                       DISPLAY AGAIN
MAIN0250 DS    0H
         L     R5,DXD_FIRST_BOOKMARK          FIRST BOOKMARK ON SCREEN
         CLI   SPF_ZSCROLLA,C'M'              MAX?
         BE    MAIN0290
         L     R1,SPF_ZSCROLLN                NBR OF LINES
         B     MAIN0270
MAIN0260 DS    0H
         ST    R5,DXD_FIRST_BOOKMARK
         ICM   R5,15,BOOKMARK_NEXT            NEXT BOOKMARK
         BZ    MAIN0210                       END OF CHAIN
MAIN0270 DS    0H
         BCT   R1,MAIN0260                    LOOP
         B     MAIN0210
MAIN0280 DS    0H
         ST    R5,DXD_FIRST_BOOKMARK
MAIN0290 DS    0H
         ICM   R5,15,BOOKMARK_NEXT
         BNZ   MAIN0290
         B     MAIN0210
MAIN0300 DS    0H
         MVC   DXD_FIRST_BOOKMARK,STORCOMM_BOOKMARK_CHAIN
         B     MAIN0210
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0350 DS    0H
         MVC   SPF_MSG_1(MSG04_L),MSG04
         B     EXIT0008
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0400 DS    0H
         MVC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,DXD_PANEL
         B     EXIT0008
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
ERR0010  DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=TOO_LONG
         MVC   SPF_MSG_1(MSG01_L),MSG01
         B     EXIT0008
ERR0020  DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=NOT_FND
         MVC   SPF_MSG_1(MSG03_L),MSG03
         B     EXIT0008
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
EXIT0000 DS    0H
         SR    R15,R15
         B     EXITEXIT
EXIT0008 DS    0H
         LA    R15,8
EXITEXIT DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=EXIT,                                               +
               RDATA1=R15
         L     R13,4(,R13)                     RESTORE R13
         L     R14,12(,R13)                    RESTORE R14
         LM    R0,R12,20(R13)                  RESTORE REGISTERS
         BR    R14                             RETURN
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START      DC       Q(DXDBOOK)
V_STORSTOR     DC       V(STORSTOR)
H9             DC       H'9'
H10            DC       H'10'

PANEL_NAME     DC       CL8'STORBOOK'

MSG01          DS       0C
               DC       C'STORBOOK01E '
               DC       C'Bookmark name too long'
MSG01_L        EQU      *-MSG01

MSG02          DS       0C
               DC       C'STORBOOK02I '
               DC       C'Bookmark replaced'
MSG02_L        EQU      *-MSG02

MSG03          DS       0C
               DC       C'STORBOOK03E '
               DC       C'Not found'
MSG03_L        EQU      *-MSG03

MSG04          DS       0C
               DC       C'STORBOOK04I '
               DC       C'No bookmarks'
MSG04_L        EQU      *-MSG04

MSG05          DS       0C
               DC       C'STORBOOK05I '
               DC       C'New bookmark created'
MSG05_L        EQU      *-MSG05

               LTORG

DETAIL         DS       0C
               DC       AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH)
DETAIL_NAME    DC       CL8' '
               DC       AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_TURQUOISE)
DETAIL_AS_NAME DC       CL8' '
               DC       AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_NORMAL)
DETAIL_AS_ID   DC       CL4' '
               DC       AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_GREEN)
DETAIL_ADDR    DC       CL8' '
               DC       AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_NORMAL)
DETAIL_DISP    DC       CL8' '
               DC       AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW)
DETAIL_CB      DC       CL8' '
DETAIL_L       EQU      *-DETAIL
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXDBOOK            DSECT
                   COPY    DXDPREF
DXD_FIRST_BOOKMARK DS      A
DXD_NAME           DS      CL8
DXD_PANEL          DS      CL8
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     BOOKMARK
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COMMON
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               SESSION  TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               BPXYSTAT DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               STORCOMM
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               OSSPFD   TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     ATTRS
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     TRENTRY
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
               COPY     REGEQU
               END      STORBOOK

STORCB.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*  Process 'CB' commands                                              *
*                                                                     *
*  ASID            STORCOMM_ASID                                      *
*  ASCB address    STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR                                 *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
STORCB   CSECT
STORCB   AMODE 31
STORCB   RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING STORCB,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'STORCB'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                  SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                          COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING STORCB,R10                       DEFINE BASE
         USING STORCOMM,R9
         L     R15,SESS_DXD_ADDR                WORK AREA BASE
         A     R15,DXD_START                    PLUS DISP
         ST    R13,4(,R15)                      SAVE R13
         ST    R15,8(,R13)                      CHAIN SAVE AREA
         LR    R13,R15
         USING DXDCB,R13                        DEFINE WORK AREA BASE
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY,                                              +
               DATA1=(STORCOMM_FUNCTION,1),                            +
               DATA2=SPF_ZCMD
         XC    DXD_RC,DXD_RC
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_OK
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         CLI   STORCOMM_FUNCTION,$STORCOMM_FORMAT
         BE    MAIN0000
         CLI   STORCOMM_FUNCTION,$STORCOMM_COMMAND
         BE    CMD0000
         CLI   STORCOMM_FUNCTION,$STORCOMM_PNS
         BE    PNS0000
         CLI   STORCOMM_FUNCTION,$STORCOMM_CLEANUP
         BE    EXIT0000
         DC    H'0'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0000 DS    0H
         CLC   SPF_ZCMD,COMM_BLANKS           COMMAND STILL PRESENT?
         BE    MAIN0030                       NO
         TM    OPERAND_02_TYPE,$OPERAND_PRESENT
         BNO   MAIN0030                       RESUME CURRENT
         XC    DXD_FIRST_CB,DXD_FIRST_CB      NOT DISPLAYING CB'S
         MVC   DXD_CB_NAME,COMM_BLANKS        INITIALIZE WORK AREA
         SR    R1,R1
         ICM   R1,3,OPERAND_02_LENGTH         OPERAND LENGTH
         BCTR  R1,0
         ICM   R2,15,OPERAND_02_ADDRESS       OPERAND ADDRESS
         EX    R1,CB_MVC                      COPY CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         CLC   =C'? ',DXD_CB_NAME             LIST CONTROL BLOCKS?
         BE    MAIN1000                       YES
         ITRACE ID=LOCATE,                                             +
               DATA1=(DXD_CB_NAME,8)
         LA    R2,CB_TABLE
         USING CB_DSECT,R2
MAIN0010 DS    0H
         CLC   CB_NAME,DXD_CB_NAME            BLOCK LOCATED?
         BE    MAIN0020                       YES
         CLI   CB_NAME,X'FF'                  END OF TABLE?
         BE    ERR0010                        YES
         LA    R2,CB_DSECT_L(,R2)             NEXT CONTROL BLOCK
         B     MAIN0010
CB_MVC   MVC   DXD_CB_NAME(0),0(R2)           COPY NAME TO WORK AREA
MAIN0020 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=FOUND,                                              +
               RDATA1=R2,                                              +
               DATA2=0(R1)
         L     R1,CB_TABLE_ADDR               FORMATTING INFO
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE           SET ADRESS
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,0(R1)         COPY CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,0(R1)  COPY CONTROL BLOCK DESC
         MVC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,48(R1)         COPY PANEL NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_PANEL_NAME,48(R1)     COPY PANEL NAME
         LA    R1,56(,R1)                     FIRST FIELD
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST           SET ADDRESS
         MVC   SPF_ZCMD,COMM_BLANKS
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Trace control block being formatted                          *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0030 DS    0H
         OC    DXD_FIRST_CB,DXD_FIRST_CB      DISPLAYING LIST OF CB'S?
         BNZ   MAIN1000                       YES
         L     R1,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE
         ITRACE ID=CB,                                                 +
               DATA1=STORCOMM_CB_NAME,                                 +
               DATA2=(STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,4)
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Initialize dynamic area                                      *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         L     R0,STORCOMM_VDATA_ADDR         VDATA ADDRESS
         L     R1,STORCOMM_VDATA_LENGTH       VDATA LENGTH
         SR    R14,R14
         SR    R15,R15
         MVCL  R0,R14                         INITIALIZE VDATA
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Initialize point-and-shoot table                             *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         L     R0,STORCOMM_PNS_TABLE_ADDR     PNS TABLE ADDRESS
         ST    R0,DXD_CURRENT_PNS             INITIALIZE CURRENT
         L     R1,STORCOMM_PNS_TABLE_LENGTH   PNS TABLE LENGTH
         SR    R14,R14
         SR    R15,R15
         MVCL  R0,R14                         INITIALIZE PNS TABLE
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Initialize buffer addr and nbr of lines                      *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         L     R6,STORCOMM_VDATA_ADDR         VDATA ADDRESS
         L     R7,SPF_VDEPTH                  NUMBER OF LINES
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Get into key zero                                            *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         OI    COMM_FLAGS,$COMM_AUTH_ON
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                        APF AUTHORIZE OURSELVES
         ITRACE ID=ZERO
         MODESET KEY=ZERO                     ENTER KEY 0
         NI    COMM_FLAGS,255-$COMM_AUTH_ON
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                        RESET APF AUTHORIZATION
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Set secondary address space                                  *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         LH    R1,STORCOMM_ASID
         ITRACE ID=SSAR,                                               +
               RDATA1=R1
         SSAR  (R1)
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*        Build display                                                *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         L     R4,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST           FIRST FIELD
         USING FIELD_DSECT,R4                 DEFINE BASE
MAIN0040 DS    0H
         ST    R4,STORCOMM_CB_LAST            SAVE FIELD ADDR
         L     R3,DXD_CURRENT_PNS
         USING PNS,R3
         ITRACE ID=FIELD,                                              +
               DATA1=FIELD_NAME,                                       +
               RDATA2=R3
         ST    R4,PNS_FIELD_ADDR              FIELD ADDR
         CLI   FIELD_TYPE,C'H'                HEADING?
         BE    MAIN0430                       YES
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
V        USING MSG01,R6
         MVC   V.MSG01_NAME,FIELD_NAME        COPY NAME
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,FIELD_DESC        COPY DESCRIPTION
         UNPK  COMM_INFO_01(5),FIELD_DISP(3)  UNPACK DISP TO DATA
         MVC   V.MSG01_DISP,COMM_INFO_01
         TR    V.MSG01_DISP,COMM_HEXCHAR      TRANSLATE
         SR    R5,R5
         ICM   R5,3,FIELD_DISP                DISP TO DATA
         A     R5,STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR          PLUS BASE ADDRESS
         ST    R5,PNS_DATA_ADDR
         ITRACE ID=DATAADDR,                                           +
               DATA1=(PNS_DATA_ADDR,4),       .. DATA ADDR             +
               DATA2=(PNS_FIELD_ADDR,4)       .. FIELD ADDR
         CLI   FIELD_TYPE,C'A'                ADDRESS FIELD?
         BE    MAIN0100                       YES
         CLI   FIELD_TYPE,C'C'                CHARACTER FIELD?
         BE    MAIN0050                       YES
         CLI   FIELD_TYPE,C'D'                DUMMY?
         BE    MAIN0320                       YES
         CLI   FIELD_TYPE,C'L'                LENGTH FIELD?
         BE    MAIN0200                       YES
         CLI   FIELD_TYPE,C'N'                NUMBER FIELD?
         BE    MAIN0200                       YES
         CLI   FIELD_TYPE,C'T'                BINARY TIME?
         BE    MAIN0300                       YES
         CLI   FIELD_TYPE,C'X'                HEX FIELD?
         BE    MAIN0100                       YES
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
         B     MAIN0320
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0050 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=CHAR
         SR    R1,R1
         ICM   R1,1,FIELD_DATA_LENGTH         LENGTH
         CH    R1,=Y(L'MSG01_DATA)            TOO LONG?
         BNH   MAIN0060                       NO
         LH    R1,=Y(L'MSG01_DATA)            LIMIT LENGTH
MAIN0060 DS    0H
         BCTR  R1,0                           FOR EX
         LAM   R5,R5,F1
         SAC   512
         EX    R1,CHAR_MVC                    EX MVC
         SAC   0
         LAM   R5,R5,F0
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
         B     MAIN0320
CHAR_MVC MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(0),0(R5)          COPY DATA
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0100 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=HEX_ADDR
         CLI   FIELD_DATA_LENGTH,8            EIGHT BYTES?
         BE    MAIN0170
         CLI   FIELD_DATA_LENGTH,7            SEVEN BYTES?
         BE    MAIN0160
         CLI   FIELD_DATA_LENGTH,6            SIX BYTES?
         BE    MAIN0150
         CLI   FIELD_DATA_LENGTH,5            FIVE BYTES?
         BE    MAIN0140
         CLI   FIELD_DATA_LENGTH,4            FOUR BYTES?
         BE    MAIN0130
         CLI   FIELD_DATA_LENGTH,3            THREE?
         BE    MAIN0120
         CLI   FIELD_DATA_LENGTH,2            TWO?
         BE    MAIN0110
         LA    R1,UNPK_1                      UNPK ADDR
         LA    R2,MVC_1                       MVC ADDR
         LA    R3,TR_1                        TR ADDR
         B     MAIN0180
MAIN0110 DS    0H
         LA    R1,UNPK_2                      UNPK ADDR
         LA    R2,MVC_2                       MVC ADDR
         LA    R3,TR_2                        TR ADDR
         B     MAIN0180
MAIN0120 DS    0H
         LA    R1,UNPK_3                      UNPK ADDR
         LA    R2,MVC_3                       MVC ADDR
         LA    R3,TR_3                        TR ADDR
         B     MAIN0180
MAIN0130 DS    0H
         LA    R1,UNPK_4                      UNPK ADDR
         LA    R2,MVC_4                       MVC ADDR
         LA    R3,TR_4                        TR ADDR
         B     MAIN0180
MAIN0140 DS    0H
         LA    R1,UNPK_5                      UNPK ADDR
         LA    R2,MVC_5                       MVC ADDR
         LA    R3,TR_5                        TR ADDR
         B     MAIN0180
MAIN0150 DS    0H
         LA    R1,UNPK_6                      UNPK ADDR
         LA    R2,MVC_6                       MVC ADDR
         LA    R3,TR_6                        TR ADDR
         B     MAIN0180
MAIN0160 DS    0H
         LA    R1,UNPK_7                      UNPK ADDR
         LA    R2,MVC_7                       MVC ADDR
         LA    R3,TR_7                        TR ADDR
         B     MAIN0180
MAIN0170 DS    0H
         LAM   R5,R5,F1
         SAC   512
         UNPK  COMM_INFO_01+0(9),0(5,R5)      UNPACK DATA
         UNPK  COMM_INFO_01+8(9),4(5,R5)      UNPACK DATA
         SAC   0
         LAM   R5,R5,F0
         MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(16),COMM_INFO_01
         TR    V.MSG01_DATA(16),COMM_HEXCHAR
         B     MAIN0190
MAIN0180 DS    0H
         LAM   R5,R5,F1
         SAC   512
         EX    R0,0(R1)                       UNPACK DATA
         SAC   0
         LAM   R5,R5,F0
         EX    R0,0(R2)                       COPY UNPACK DATA
         EX    R0,0(R3)                       TRANSLATE UNPACKED DATA
MAIN0190 DS    0H
         BAL   R1,LINE0000                    NEXT LINE
         B     MAIN0320                       CHECK FOR TESTS
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
UNPK_1   UNPK  COMM_INFO_01(3),0(2,R5)        UNPACK DATA
MVC_1    MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(2),COMM_INFO_01
TR_1     TR    V.MSG01_DATA(2),COMM_HEXCHAR
UNPK_2   UNPK  COMM_INFO_01(5),0(3,R5)        UNPACK DATA
MVC_2    MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(4),COMM_INFO_01
TR_2     TR    V.MSG01_DATA(4),COMM_HEXCHAR
UNPK_3   UNPK  COMM_INFO_01(7),0(4,R5)        UNPACK DATA
MVC_3    MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(6),COMM_INFO_01
TR_3     TR    V.MSG01_DATA(6),COMM_HEXCHAR
UNPK_4   UNPK  COMM_INFO_01(9),0(5,R5)        UNPACK DATA
MVC_4    MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(8),COMM_INFO_01
TR_4     TR    V.MSG01_DATA(8),COMM_HEXCHAR
UNPK_5   UNPK  COMM_INFO_01(11),0(6,R5)       UNPACK DATA
MVC_5    MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(10),COMM_INFO_01
TR_5     TR    V.MSG01_DATA(10),COMM_HEXCHAR
UNPK_6   UNPK  COMM_INFO_01(13),0(7,R5)       UNPACK DATA
MVC_6    MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(12),COMM_INFO_01
TR_6     TR    V.MSG01_DATA(12),COMM_HEXCHAR
UNPK_7   UNPK  COMM_INFO_01(15),0(8,R5)       UNPACK DATA
MVC_7    MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(14),COMM_INFO_01
TR_7     TR    V.MSG01_DATA(14),COMM_HEXCHAR
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0200 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=LEN_NBR
         LAM   R5,R5,F1
         SAC   512
         SR    R0,R0
         CLI   FIELD_DATA_LENGTH,4            FOUR BYTES?
         BE    MAIN0230
         CLI   FIELD_DATA_LENGTH,3            THREE?
         BE    MAIN0220
         CLI   FIELD_DATA_LENGTH,2            TWO?
         BE    MAIN0210
         ICM   R0,1,0(R5)
         B     MAIN0240
MAIN0210 DS    0H
         ICM   R0,3,0(R5)
         B     MAIN0240
MAIN0220 DS    0H
         ICM   R0,7,0(R5)
         B     MAIN0240
MAIN0230 DS    0H
         ICM   R0,15,0(R5)
MAIN0240 DS    0H
         SAC   0
         LAM   R5,R5,F0
         ITRACE ID=NBR,                                                +
               RDATA1=R0
         LTR   R1,R1
         BZ    MAIN0270
         MVC   COMM_INFO_01,COMM_BLANKS
         CVD   R0,COMM_DWORD
         MVC   COMM_INFO_01(L'EDITWORD_1),EDITWORD_1
         ED    COMM_INFO_01(L'EDITWORD_1),COMM_DWORD
         LA    R1,COMM_INFO_01
MAIN0250 DS    0H
         CLI   0(R1),C' '
         BNE   MAIN0260
         LA    R1,1(,R1)
         B     MAIN0250
MAIN0260 DS    0H
         MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(L'EDITWORD_1),0(R1)
         B     MAIN0280
MAIN0270 DS    0H
         MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(L'C_ZERO),C_ZERO
MAIN0280 DS    0H
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
         B     MAIN0320
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*        Convert time fields                                          *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0300 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=TIME
         LAM   R5,R5,F1
         SAC   512
         ICM   R1,15,0(R5)                        INSERT TIME
         SAC   0
         LAM   R5,R5,F0
         SR    R0,R0
         SR    R0,R0
         D     R0,F100                            CONVERT TO SECONDS
         SR    R0,R0                              CLEAR REMAINDER
         D     R0,F3600                           COMPUTE HOURS
         CVD   R1,COMM_DWORD                      CONVERT HOURS
         MVC   COMM_INFO_01(L'EDITWORD_2),EDITWORD_2
         ED    COMM_INFO_01(L'EDITWORD_2),COMM_DWORD+6
         MVC   COMM_INFO_02+0(2),COMM_INFO_01+2   COPY HOURS
         MVI   COMM_INFO_02+2,C':'                INSERT COLON
         LR    R1,R0                              COPY REMAINDER
         SR    R0,R0                              CLEAR R0
         D     R0,F60                             COMPUTE MINUTES
         CVD   R1,COMM_DWORD                      CONVERT
         MVC   COMM_INFO_01(L'EDITWORD_2),EDITWORD_2
         ED    COMM_INFO_01(L'EDITWORD_2),COMM_DWORD+6
         MVC   COMM_INFO_02+3(2),COMM_INFO_01+2   COPY MINUTES
         MVI   COMM_INFO_02+5,C':'                INSERT COLON
         CVD   R0,COMM_DWORD                      CONVERT TO DECIMAL
         MVC   COMM_INFO_01(L'EDITWORD_2),EDITWORD_2
         ED    COMM_INFO_01(L'EDITWORD_2),COMM_DWORD+6
         MVC   COMM_INFO_02+6(2),COMM_INFO_01+2
         MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(8),COMM_INFO_02       COPY TIME
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*        Call exit if present                                         *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0320 DS    0H
         ICM   R15,15,FIELD_EXIT              EXIT ADDRESS
         BZ    MAIN0330                       NO EXIT
         MVC   FIELD_EXIT_PNS,DXD_CURRENT_PNS PASS CURRENT PNS
         ST    R4,FIELD_EXIT_FIELD            PASS FIELD ADDR
         ST    R6,FIELD_EXIT_VDATA            PASS VDATA BUFFER ADDR
         STH   R7,FIELD_EXIT_LINES            PASS LINES AVAILABLE
         SAC   0
         LAM   R5,R5,F0
         EPAR  (R1)
         SSAR  (R1)
         ITRACE ID=CALLEXIT,                                           +
               RDATA1=R15
         BALR  R14,R15                        CALL EXIT
         LH    R1,STORCOMM_ASID
         SSAR  (R1)
         LAM   R5,R5,F1
         SAC   512
         MVC   DXD_CURRENT_PNS,FIELD_EXIT_PNS COPY UPDATED PNS ADDR
         L     R6,FIELD_EXIT_VDATA            UPDATED BUFFER ADDRESS
         ICM   R7,3,FIELD_EXIT_LINES          LINES AVAILABLE
         BZ    EXIT0000                       NO LINES LEFT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*        Check for bit flags or values                                *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0330 DS    0H
         CLI   FIELD_TEST_TYPE,0              ANY TYPE OF TESTS?
         BE    MAIN0500                       NO
         CLI   FIELD_TEST_TYPE,$FIELD_BIT     BIT FLAG TESTS?
         BE    MAIN0340                       YES
         CLI   FIELD_TEST_TYPE,$FIELD_VALUE   VALUE TESTS?
         BE    MAIN0400                       YES
         DC    H'0'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Test bit(s)                                                  *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0340 DS    0H
         SR    R2,R2
         ICM   R2,1,FIELD_NBR_TESTS           NBR OF TESTS
         LA    R3,FIELD_VALUE_NAME            FIRST VALUE/DESCRIPTION
         USING FIELD_VALUE_NAME,R3
MAIN0350 DS    0H
         SR    R1,R1
         ICM   R1,1,FIELD_VALUE               BIT VALUE TO TEST FOR
         LAM   R5,R5,F1
         SAC   512
         EX    R1,BIT_TM                      BIT(S) ON?
         BNO   MAIN0360                       NO
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR_1,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_TURQUOISE
         MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(L'FIELD_VALUE_NAME),FIELD_VALUE_NAME
         SAC   0
         LAM   R5,R5,F0
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR_2,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,FIELD_VALUE_DESC  COPY DESCRIPTION
         BAL   R1,LINE0000                    NEXT LINE ON DISPLAY
MAIN0360 DS    0H
         SAC   0
         LAM   R5,R5,F0
         LA    R3,FIELD_VALUE_L(,R3)          NEXT BIT(S)/DESCRIPTION
         BCT   R2,MAIN0350
         B     MAIN0500
BIT_TM   TM    0(R5),0                        TEST BIT(S)
         DROP  R3
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Test values                                                  *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0400 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=VALUE
         SR    R2,R2
         ICM   R2,1,FIELD_NBR_TESTS           NBR OF VALUES
         BZ    MAIN0500                       NONE
MAIN0410 DS    0H
         LAM   R5,R5,F1
         SAC   512
         CLC   FIELD_VALUE,0(R5)              VALUE LOCATED?
         BE    MAIN0420                       YES
         LA    R3,FIELD_VALUE_L(,R3)          NEXT VALUE/DESCRIPTOR
         BCT   R2,MAIN0410                    LOOP
         SAC   0
         LAM   R5,R5,F0
         B     MAIN0500                       NOT LOCATED
MAIN0420 DS    0H
         SAC   0
         LAM   R5,R5,F0
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR_2,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,FIELD_VALUE_DESC
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
         B     MAIN0500
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0430 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=HEADING
         MVI   0(R6),$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH
         MVC   1(L'FIELD_DESC,R6),FIELD_DESC
         BAL   R1,LINE0000
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*        Next field                                                   *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0500 DS    0H
         SR    R0,R0
         ICM   R0,3,FIELD_ENTRY_LENGTH        LENGTH OF THIS ENTRY
         ITRACE ID=NEXT_FLD,                                           +
               RDATA1=R4,                                              +
               RDATA2=R0
         AR    R4,R0                          NEXT FIELD
         CLI   0(R4),X'FF'                    END OF FIELDS?
         BNE   MAIN0040                       NO
