         FIELD TCBFBYT4,X,1,'Flag byte',                               +
               BIT1=(TCBPMC,'Must complete'),                          +
               BIT2=(TCBNOJLB,'No not use TCBJLB'),                    +
               BIT3=(TCBATSKL,'TASKLIB from authorized user')
         FIELD TCBRPT,A,4,'RADIX partition tree for local storage',    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCBVAT,A,4,'VAT (VSAM)',                                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCBSWASA,A,4,'SWA manager save area',                   +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCBSVCA2,A,4,'SVC screening table',                     +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCBERD,A,4,'Extended region descriptor',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCBEAE,A,4,'Extended allocated element queue',          +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCBARC,X,4,'Reason code for abend'
         FIELD TCBGRES,N,4,'Global resources owned by this task'
         FIELD TCBSTCB,A,4,'STCB address',                             +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=TCBTBL
         FIELD TCBCELAP,A,4,'Common execution library',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCBRBYT1,X,1,'RTM flags',                               +
               BIT1=(TCBPVICT,'ABEND 13E due to parallel DETACH'),     +
               BIT2=(TCBPKING,'Responsible for removing subtasks'),    +
               BIT3=(TCBPCAND,'Parallel DETACH protection'),           +
               BIT4=(TCBPTOP,'At top of task tree parallel DETACHed')
         FIELD TCBBDT,A,4,'BDT''s GSD linkage control block'
         FIELD TCBNDAXP,N,4,'Dispatches before dispatch on AXP'
         FIELD TCBSENV,A,4,'ACEE address',                             +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         DC    X'FF'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY  FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             IBMMAC   TCB=LIST
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             END      TCBTBL

TCTTBL.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
TCTTBL   CSECT
TCTTBL   AMODE 31
TCTTBL   RMODE ANY
         DC    CL8'TCT'                  CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         DC    CL40'SMF timing control table'
         DC    CL8'STORCB'               PANEL NAME
         FIELD BASE=SMFTCT
         FIELD TCTQA,A,3,'Queue address of TCT',                       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTSW,X,1,'Switches',                                   +
               BIT1=(TCTJSTI,'TQE contains JOB time'),                 +
               BIT2=(TCTIEX,'Error in I/O counts'),                    +
               BIT3=(TCTISK30,'Type 30 interval record skipped'),      +
               BIT4=(TCTISK32,'Type 32 interval record skipped'),      +
               BIT5=(TCTIABD,'Previous interval ABENDed'),             +
               BIT6=(TCTSTPRN,'Step ran'),                             +
               BIT7=(TCTACTRT,'IEFACTRT in control'),                  +
               BIT8=(TCTDCOPN,'DMPCHK in control')
         FIELD TCTTCB,A,4,'Initiator''s TCB',                          +
               PNS=STORCB,                                             +
               TABLE=TCBTBL
         FIELD TCTCRTBL,A,4,'TCT storage table',                       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTIOTBL,A,4,'TCT I/O table',                           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTPOOL,N,2,'Subpool number'
         FIELD TCTSZE,X,2,'TCT size (hex)'
         FIELD TCTSZE,N,2,'TCT size (decimal)'
         FIELD TCTUTL,A,4,'User time limit routine',                   +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTJMR,A,4,'Job management record (JMR)',               +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTJMR,A,4,'Job management record (JMR)',               +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTTJLM,X,4,'Remaining job time'
         FIELD TCTIOCS,N,4,'Session I/O service'
         FIELD TCTLIN,N,4,'Lines of terminal input (TSO)'
         FIELD TCTLOUT,N,4,'Lines of terminal output (TSO)'
         FIELD TCTAST,X,4,'Allocation start time'
         FIELD TCTPPST,X,4,'Time problem program LOADed'
         FIELD TCTAJS,N,4,'Accumulated session service'
         FIELD TCTACT,X,4,'Accumulated active time'
         FIELD TCTMSOS,N,4,'Accumulated main storage service'
         FIELD TCTSRBS,N,4,'Accumulated session SRB service'
         FIELD TCTPDASD,N,4,'Nonspecific DASD mounts'
         FIELD TCTRDASD,N,4,'Specific DASD mounts'
         FIELD TCTPTAPE,N,4,'Nonspecific TAPE mounts'
         FIELD TCTRTAPE,N,4,'Specific TAPE mounts'
         FIELD TCTPMSS,N,4,'Nonspecific MSS mounts'
         FIELD TCTRMSS,N,4,'Specific MSS mounts'
         FIELD TCTEJST,N,4,'Last value of elapsed TCB time'
         FIELD TCTSRBT,N,4,'Last value of elapsed SRB time'
         FIELD TCTSVTEP,N,4,'Last value of total block count'
         FIELD TCTLINSV,N,4,'Last value of TPUT count'
         FIELD TCTLOUTS,N,4,'Last value of TGET count'
         FIELD TCTTRAN,N,4,'Last value of FOREGROUND trans'
         FIELD TCTITCB,X,4,'Initiator TCB time'
         FIELD TCTISRB,X,4,'Initiator SRB time'
         FIELD TCTT30J,A,4,'JOB total type 30 record',                 +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT30S,A,4,'STEP total type 30 record',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT30H,A,4,'EXCP HOLD type 30 record',                 +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTLCTAD,A,4,'LCT address',                             +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT32J,A,4,'JOB total type 32 record',                 +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCT32SP,A,4,'Step total type 32 record',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCT32BLK,A,4,'Detail control block',                    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTLRRCT,N,4,'Last value of re-read count'
         FIELD TCTIOSAV,A,4,'Address of save area for IEFSMFEX',       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTDCTI,N,4,'Last value of device connect time'
         FIELD TCTTIMER,A,4,'SMF timer element',                       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTTMRSP,X,4,'Timer element subpool and size'
         FIELD TCTPARMS,X,4,'Timer parameter list',                    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTPRMSP,X,4,'Timer parms subpool and size'
         FIELD TCTPRMSP,X,4,'Timer parms subpool and size'
         FIELD TCTSNAME,C,8,'STEP name'
         FIELD TCTTCT,C,8,'TCT eyecatcher'
         FIELD TCTMSCT,N,4,'Times I/O measurements turned off',        +
               BIT1=(TCTMSOFF,'I/O measurements are ON')
         FIELD TCTEIIP,X,4,'Elapsed I/O interrupt time'
         FIELD TCTERCT,X,4,'Elapsed RCT CPU time'
         FIELD TCTRQSVP,A,4,'SYSEVENT REQSVDAT parm list',             +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTE39PP,A,4,'SYSEVENT REQPGDAT parm list',             +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTADMFW,N,4,'Pages moved with ADMF WRITE'
         FIELD TCTADMFR,N,4,'Pages moved with ADMF READ'
         FIELD TCTEHPT,N,4,'Elapsed HIPERSPACE processing time'
         FIELD TCTINTST,X,4,'Interval start time'
         FIELD TCTINTDT,X,4,'Interval start date'
         FIELD TCTFETIO,X,4,'First ETCTIOT block',                     +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTLETIO,X,4,'Last ETCTIOT block',                      +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTESUBP,N,2,'ETCTIOT subpool'
         FIELD TCTELEN,N,2,'ETCTIOT length'
         FIELD TCTEBLK,N,4,'Number of ECTTIOT 4K blocks'
         FIELD TCTEFAVL,X,4,'First available ECTTIOT token'
         FIELD TCTELAVL,X,4,'Last available ECTTIOT token'
         FIELD TCTENAVL,X,4,'Number of available ECTTIOT entries'
         FIELD TCTEFLGS,X,4,'ECTTIOT flags',                           +
               BIT1=(TCTCOMP,'TCTTIOT being moved'),                   +
               BIT2=(TCTDUMMY,'Dummy TCTTIOT')
         FIELD TCTANSC,N,4,'Integrated crypto service'
         FIELD TCTTMRFL+0,X,1,'Internal timer flags',                  +
               BIT1=(TCTCTF,'SMF30CPT invalid'),                       +
               BIT2=(TCTCSF,'SMF30CPS invalid'),                       +
               BIT3=(TCTVUF,'SMF30JVU invalid'),                       +
               BIT4=(TCTVAF,'SMF30JVA invalid'),                       +
               BIT5=(TCTISF,'SMF30ISB invalid'),                       +
               BIT6=(TCTICF,'SMF30ICU invalid'),                       +
               BIT7=(TCTIVF,'SMF30IVU invalid'),                       +
               BIT8=(TCTIAF,'SMF30IVA invalid')
         FIELD TCTTMRFL+1,X,1,'Internal timer flags',                  +
               BIT1=(TCTIIF,'SMF30IIP invalid'),                       +
               BIT2=(TCTHPF,'SMF30HPT invalid'),                       +
               BIT3=(TCTRCF,'SMF30RCT invalid'),                       +
               BIT4=(TCTASF,'SMF30ASR invalid'),                       +
               BIT5=(TCTENF,'SMF30ENC invalid'),                       +
               BIT6=(TCTDEF,'SMF30DET invalid')
         FIELD TCTFLAGS,X,1,'TCT flags',                               +
               BIT1=(TCTTCT2,'DSABTCT2 should be used for lookup')
         FIELD TCTSRMSP,N,1,'Subpool for TCTRQSVP, TCTE39PP'
         FIELD TCTT33SP,A,4,'Type 33 TP work area',                    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT33J,A,4,'Type 33 TP JOB record',                    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT33S,A,4,'Type 33 TP STEP record',                   +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTTPTYP,X,4,'APPC TP type'
         FIELD TCTTPTCB,X,4,'TP TCB time'
         FIELD TCTTPSRB,X,4,'TP SRB time'
         FIELD TCTTPEXP,N,4,'TP EXCPs'
         FIELD TCTTPDCT,N,4,'TP device connect time'
         FIELD TCTTPNUM,N,4,'TP transactions processed'
         FIELD TCTTPCON,N,4,'TP conversations'
         FIELD TCTTPTAC,N,4,'TP active conversations'
         FIELD TCTTPCNA,N,4,'TP conversations allocated'
         FIELD TCTTPSEN,N,4,'TP SENDs'
         FIELD TCTTPDAT,X,8,'TP bytes sent'
         FIELD TCTTPREC,N,4,'TP RECEIVEs'
         FIELD TCTTPDAR,N,4,'TP bytes received'
         FIELD TCTSUBNM,C,4,'TP scheduler'
         FIELD TCTOMVSP,A,4,'TCTOMVS table address',                   +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT30PH,A,4,'T30AREA for process data',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT30SE,A,4,'T30AREA for step EXCP data',              +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT30SP,A,4,'T30AREA for step process data',           +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT30JE,A,4,'T30AREA for JOB EXCP data',               +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT30JP,A,4,'T30AREA for JOB process data',            +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTISS,X,8,'SMF interval start time'
         FIELD TCTUACL,X,4,'Usage ACA lock word'
         FIELD TCTUACA,A,4,'First ACA',                                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTUTCAC,A,4,'First TCA on consolidated chain',         +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTUTCA,A,4,'First TCA on chain',                       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTUFCAC,A,4,'First FCA on consolidated chain',         +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTUFCA,A,4,'First FCA on chain',                       +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTRSMGT,X,4,'Usage RESMGR token'
         FIELD TCTUTIMR,A,4,'Usage timer element',                     +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTUTPRM,A,4,'Usage timer ParmArea',                    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT30UH,A,4,'T30AREA hold area for usage entries',     +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT30US,A,4,'T30AREA step hold area for usage entries',+
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT30UJ,A,4,'T30AREA JOB hold area for usage entries', +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTARMP,A,4,'TCTARM table',                             +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT30AH,A,4,'T30AREA for ARM data',                    +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT30SA,A,4,'T30AREA for step ARM data',               +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         FIELD TCTT30JA,A,4,'T30AREA for JOB ARM data',                +
               PNS=STORSTOR
         DC    X'FF'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         IEFTCT   DSECT=YES
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     REGEQU
         END      TCTTBL

TIOTEXIT.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*  Module name: TIOTEXIT                                              *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*  Displays ASCBs                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*  ASID            STORCOMM_ASID                                      *
*  ASCB address    STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR                                 *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
TIOTEXIT CSECT
TIOTEXIT AMODE 31
TIOTEXIT RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING TIOTEXIT,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'TIOTEXIT'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                  SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                          COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING TIOTEXIT,R10                     DEFINE BASE
         USING STORCOMM,R9
         L     R15,SESS_DXD_ADDR                WORK AREA BASE
         A     R15,DXD_START                    PLUS DISP
         ST    R13,4(,R15)                      SAVE R13
         ST    R15,8(,R13)                      CHAIN SAVE AREA
         LR    R13,R15
         USING DXDTIOT,R13                      DEFINE WORK AREA BASE
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY,                                              +
               DATA1=(STORCOMM_FUNCTION,1)
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_OK
         CLI   STORCOMM_FUNCTION,$STORCOMM_COMMAND
         BE    CMD0000
         CLI   STORCOMM_FUNCTION,$STORCOMM_PNS
         BE    PNS0000
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Initialize vdata buffer                                      *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         L     R0,STORCOMM_VDATA_ADDR
         L     R1,STORCOMM_VDATA_LENGTH
         SR    R14,R14
         SR    R15,R15
         MVCL  R0,R14
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Initialize point and shoot table                             *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         L     R0,STORCOMM_PNS_TABLE_ADDR
         L     R1,STORCOMM_PNS_TABLE_LENGTH
         SR    R14,R14
         SR    R15,R15
         MVCL  R0,R14
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
MAIN0000 DS    0H
         OI    COMM_FLAGS,$COMM_AUTH_ON
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                         TURN ON APF AUTH
         MODESET KEY=ZERO
         NI    COMM_FLAGS,255-$COMM_AUTH_ON
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                         TURN OFF APF AUTH
         L     R3,STORCOMM_PNS_TABLE_ADDR
         USING PNS,R3
         LH    R7,FIELD_EXIT_LINES
         L     R6,FIELD_EXIT_VDATA
         LAM   R5,R5,F1                        SET SECONDARY ALET
         SAC   512
         L     R5,STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR           CURRENT DATA ADDRESS
         USING TIOT,R5
         LH    R1,STORCOMM_ASID
         ITRACE ID=SSAR,                                               +
               RDATA1=R1
         SSAR  (R1)
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*        Format TIOT                                                  *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         MVC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,PANEL_NAME
         CLC   TIOCNJOB,STORCOMM_SPACE_NAME   MATCH JOB NAME?
         BE    MAIN0010                       YES
         CLC   TIOCSTEP,STORCOMM_SPACE_NAME   MATCH STEP NAME?
         BNE   ERR0010                        NO
MAIN0010 DS    0H
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         A     R6,SPF_VWIDTH                  NEXT LINE
         BCTR  R7,0
         LA    R5,TIOENTRY                    1ST DD
         DROP  R5
         USING TIOENTRY,R5
MAIN0020 DS    0H
         SR    R4,R4
         ICM   R4,1,TIOELNGH                  LENGTH OF THIS ENTRY
         BZ    EXIT0000                       ZERO.. END OF TIOT
         MVC   0(MSG02_L,R6),MSG02
V        USING MSG02,R6
         CLI   TIOEDDNM,C' '                  PRINTABLE?
         BNH   MAIN0030                       NO
         MVC   V.MSG02_DD,TIOEDDNM            COPY DD NAME
MAIN0030 DS    0H
         CVD   R4,COMM_DWORD                  CONVERT TO DECIMAL
         ED    V.MSG02_LENGTH,COMM_DWORD+6    EDIT LENGTH
         UNPK  COMM_INFO_01(3),TIOESTTA(2)    UNPACK STATUS A
         MVC   V.MSG02_STATUSA,COMM_INFO_01   COPY TO VDATA
         TR    V.MSG02_STATUSA,COMM_HEXCHAR   TRANSLATE TO PRINTABLE
         UNPK  COMM_INFO_01(3),TIOESTTB(2)    UNPACK STATUS B
         MVC   V.MSG02_STATUSB,COMM_INFO_01   COPY TO VDATA
         TR    V.MSG02_STATUSB,COMM_HEXCHAR   TRANSLATE TO PRINTABLE
         UNPK  COMM_INFO_01(3),TIOESTTC(2)    UNPACK STATUS C
         MVC   V.MSG02_STATUSC,COMM_INFO_01   COPY TO VDATA
         TR    V.MSG02_STATUSC,COMM_HEXCHAR   TRANSLATE TO PRINTABLE
         TM    TIOELINK,TIOESYOT              SYSOUT?
         BO    MAIN0040                       YES
         SR    R1,R1
         ICM   R1,7,TIOEFSRT                  UCB ADDRESS
         ST    R1,PNS_DATA_ADDR               SAVE UCB ADDRESS
         BZ    MAIN0060
         USING UCBOB,R1
         UNPK  COMM_INFO_01(5),UCBCHAN(3)     UNPACK DEVICE NBR
         MVC   V.MSG02_UCB_ADDR,COMM_INFO_01  COPY TO VDATA
         TR    V.MSG02_UCB_ADDR,COMM_HEXCHAR  TRANSLATE
         DROP  R1
         B     MAIN0050
MAIN0040 DS    0H
         MVI   V.MSG02_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_TURQUOISE
         MVC   V.MSG02_VOLSER,C_JES
MAIN0050 DS    0H
         SR    R1,R1
MAIN0060 DS    0H
         LA    R2,DXD_EPA
         ST    R2,DXD_SWEPAPTR
         USING ZB505,R2
         XC    SWAEPA,SWAEPA
         MVC   SWVA,TIOEJFCB
         EPAR  (R1)
         ITRACE ID=RESET,                                              +
               RDATA1=R1
         SSAR  (R1)
         SAC   0
         ITRACE ID=SWAREQ
         SWAREQ FCODE=RL,                                              +
               EPA=DXD_SWEPAPTR,                                       +
               UNAUTH=YES,                                             +
               MF=(E,DXD_SWAPARMS)
         LH    R1,STORCOMM_ASID
         ITRACE ID=SSAR,                                               +
               RDATA1=R1
         SSAR  (R1)
         SAC   512
         L     R1,SWBLKPTR
         USING JFCB,R1
         LAM   R1,R1,F1
         MVC   INFMJFCB(JFCBLGTH),0(R1)
         LAM   R1,R1,F0
         MVC   V.MSG02_DSN,JFCBDSNM           COPY DATA SET NAME
         LA    R2,JFCBVOLS                    1ST VOLSER
         SR    R1,R1
         ICM   R1,1,JFCBNVOL                  NBR OF VOLSERS
         BZ    MAIN0090                       NO VOLSERS
MAIN0070 DS    0H
         MVC   V.MSG02_VOLSER,0(R2)           COPY VOLSER
         A     R6,SPF_VWIDTH                  NEXT LINE
         LA    R3,PNS_L(,R3)                  NEXT IN PNS TABLE
         BCT   R7,MAIN0080
         B     EXIT0000                       SCREEN FULL
MAIN0080 DS    0H
         LA    R2,6(,R2)                      NEXT VOLSER
         BCT   R1,MAIN0070
         B     MAIN0100
MAIN0090 DS    0H
         A     R6,SPF_VWIDTH                  NEXT LINE
         LA    R3,PNS_L(,R3)                  NEXT IN PNS TABLE
         BCT   R7,MAIN0100
         B     EXIT0000                       SCREEN FULL
MAIN0100 DS    0H
         AR    R5,R4                          NEXT TIOT ENTRY
         B     MAIN0020
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
CMD0000  DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=COMMAND
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
PNS0000  DS    0H
         L     R3,SPF_ROW                     ROW CURSOR WAS ON
         ITRACE ID=PNS,                                                +
               RDATA1=R7
         CH    R3,H7
         BL    EXIT0000
         SH    R3,H7
         MH    R3,=Y(PNS_L)                   MULTIPLY BY LENGTH EACH
         A     R3,STORCOMM_PNS_TABLE_ADDR     PLUS BASE
         MVC   STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR,PNS_DATA_ADDR
         XC    STORCOMM_DATA_DISP,STORCOMM_DATA_DISP
         MVC   STORCOMM_NEW_FUNCTION,V_STORCB
         L     R1,V_UCBTBL
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_TABLE           SET CB TABLE ADDR
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_NAME,0(R1)         COPY CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_CB_DESCRIPTION,8(R1)  COPY CONTROL BLOCK DESC
         MVC   SESS_DISP_PANEL,48(R1)         COPY PANEL NAME
         MVC   STORCOMM_PANEL_NAME,48(R1)     COPY PANEL NAME
         LA    R1,56(,R1)                     FIRST FIELD
         ST    R1,STORCOMM_CB_FIRST           SET ADDRESS
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_NEW
         B     EXIT0000
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
ERR0010  DS    0H
         SAC   0
         LAM   R5,R5,F0
         MVI   COMM_MSG_ID,1
         MVC   COMM_MSG_CSECT,MODID
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSMSG
         BALR  R14,R15
         MVC   SPF_MSG_1,COMM_MSG_1           COPY MESSAGE
         MVC   SPF_MSG_2,COMM_MSG_2           COPY MESSAGE
         MVC   SPF_MSG_3,COMM_MSG_3           COPY MESSAGE
         MVC   SPF_MSG_4,COMM_MSG_4           COPY MESSAGE
         MVC   SPF_MSG_5,COMM_MSG_5           COPY MESSAGE
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
EXIT0000 DS    0H
         SAC   0                              EXIT AR MODE
         LAM   R5,R5,F0                       RESET AR 5
         EPAR  (R1)
         ITRACE ID=RESET,                                              +
               RDATA1=R1
         SSAR  (R1)
         OI    COMM_FLAGS,$COMM_AUTH_ON
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                        TURN ON APF AUTH
         MODESET KEY=NZERO
         NI    COMM_FLAGS,255-$COMM_AUTH_ON
         L     R15,COMM_V_OSAUTH
         BALR  R14,R15                        TURN OFF APF AUTH
         ST    R6,FIELD_EXIT_VDATA            UPDATE VDATA BUFFER ADDR
         STH   R7,FIELD_EXIT_LINES            UPDATES LINES LEFT
         ITRACE ID=EXIT
         LH    R15,DXD_RC                     RETURN CODE
         L     R13,4(,R13)                    RESTORE R13
         L     R14,12(,R13)                   RESTORE R14
         LM    R0,R12,20(R13)                 RESTORE REGISTERS
         BR    R14                            RETURN
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START       DC       Q(DXDTIOT)
V_STORCB        DC       V(STORCB)
V_UCBTBL        DC       V(UCBTBL)

SWAPARM_I       SWAREQ   MF=L
SWAPARM_L       EQU      *-SWAPARM_I

F0              DC       F'0'
F1              DC       F'1'

H7              DC       H'7'
H8              DC       H'8'

C_JES           DC       CL6'JES   '
C_UCB           DC       CL8'UCB   '
PANEL_NAME      DC       CL8'STORTIOT'

MSG01           DS       0C
                DC       AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_TURQUOISE)
                DC       C'DD name    ln A__B__C_ Dev  VOLSER DSN'
MSG01_L         EQU      *-MSG01

MSG02           DS       0C
                DC       AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH)
MSG02_DD        DC       CL8' '
                DC       AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_NORMAL)
MSG02_LENGTH    DC       X'40202120'
                DC       C' '
MSG02_STATUSA   DC       CL2' '
                DC       C' '

MSG02_VOLSER    DC       CL6' '

MSG02_DSN       DC       CL44' '
MSG02_L         EQU      *-MSG02

                  COPY   DXDPREF

DXD_SWEPAPTR      DS    A
DXD_EPA           DS    CL28


DXD_RC            DS     H

                  IBMMAC   CVT=YES

                  IEFJESCT
                  IEFZB505 LOCEPAX=YES

TIOT              DSECT

UCBEXIT.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
UCBEXIT  CSECT
UCBEXIT  AMODE 31
UCBEXIT  RMODE ANY
         USING OSCOMM,R12
         USING SESSION,R11
         USING UCBEXIT,R15
         B     INIT0000
MODID    DC    CL8'UCBEXIT'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'
         DC    CL7'&SYSTIME'
INIT0000 DS    0H
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)                SAVE REGS
         LR    R10,R15                        COPY ENTRY POINT
         DROP  R15
         USING UCBEXIT,R10                    DEFINE BASE
         USING STORCOMM,R9
         L     R15,SESS_DXD_ADDR              WORK AREA BASE
         A     R15,DXD_START                  PLUS DISP
         ST    R13,4(,R15)                    SAVE R13
         ST    R15,8(,R13)                    CHAIN SAVE AREA
         LR    R13,R15
         USING DXDUCB,R13                     DEFINE WORK AREA BASE
         MVC   DXD_CSECT,MODID
         ITRACE ID=ENTRY
         CLI   STORCOMM_FUNCTION,$STORCOMM_COMMAND
         BE    EXIT0000
         L     R5,STORCOMM_DATA_ADDR          UCB ADDRESS
         USING UCBOB,R5
         L     R3,FIELD_EXIT_PNS
         L     R6,FIELD_EXIT_VDATA
         LH    R7,FIELD_EXIT_LINES
         MVI   STORCOMM_STATUS,$STORCOMM_OK   SET DEFAULT STATUS
         L     R8,COMM_OSSPFD
         USING OSSPFD,R8
         TM    UCBTBYT3,UCB3DACC              DASD?
         BO    DASD0000                       YES
         B     EXIT0000
DASD0000 DS    0H
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
V        USING MSG01,R6
         UNPK  COMM_DWORD(5),UCBVOLI_DISP(3)  UNPACK DISP
         MVC   V.MSG01_DISP,COMM_DWORD        COPY FIELD DISP
         TR    V.MSG01_DISP,COMM_HEXCHAR      TRANSLATE DISP
         MVC   V.MSG01_NAME,UCBVOLI_NAME      COPY FIELD NAME
         MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(L'UCBVOLI),UCBVOLI
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG02
         BAL   R1,LINE0000                    NEXT LINE
         MVC   0(MSG01_L,R6),MSG01
         UNPK  COMM_DWORD(5),UCBSTAB_DISP(3)  UNPACK DISP
         MVC   V.MSG01_DISP,COMM_DWORD        COPY FIELD DISP
         TR    V.MSG01_DISP,COMM_HEXCHAR      TRANSLATE DISP
         MVC   V.MSG01_NAME,UCBSTAB_NAME      COPY FIELD NAME
         UNPK  COMM_DWORD(3),UCBSTAB(2)       UNPACK STATUS
         MVC   V.MSG01_DATA(2),COMM_DWORD     COPY STATUS
         TR    V.MSG01_DATA(2),COMM_HEXCHAR   TRANSLATE STATUS
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG03
         BAL   R1,LINE0000                    NEXT LINE
         TM    UCBSTAB,UCBBSVL                NOT DEMOUNTABLE?
         BNO   DASD0010                       NO (TWO NO'S..?)
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG04
         BAL   R1,LINE0000                    NEXT LINE
DASD0010 DS    0H
         TM    UCBSTAB,UCBPGFL                USED FOR PAGING?
         BNO   DASD0020                       NO
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG05
         BAL   R1,LINE0000                    NEXT LINE
DASD0020 DS    0H
         TM    UCBSTAB,UCBPRSRS               PERMANENTLY RESIDENT?
         BNO   DASD0030                       NO
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG06
         BAL   R1,LINE0000                    NEXT LINE
DASD0030 DS    0H
         TM    UCBSTAB,UCBBPRV                PRIVATE VOLUME?
         BNO   DASD0040                       NO
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG07
         BAL   R1,LINE0000                    NEXT LINE
DASD0040 DS    0H
         TM    UCBSTAB,UCBBPUB                PUBLIC VOLUME?
         BNO   DASD0050                       NO
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG08
         BAL   R1,LINE0000                    NEXT LINE
DASD0050 DS    0H
         TM    UCBSTAB,UCBBSTR                STORAGE VOLUME?
         BNO   DASD0060                       NO
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG09
         BAL   R1,LINE0000                    NEXT LINE
DASD0060 DS    0H
         TM    UCBSTAB,UCBSHAR                SHARABLE?
         BNO   DASD0070                       NO
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG10
         BAL   R1,LINE0000                    NEXT LINE
DASD0070 DS    0H
         TM    UCBSTAB,UCBBNUL                CATALOG ON THIS VOLUME?
         BNO   EXIT0000                       NO
         MVI   V.MSG01_ATTR,$SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_YELLOW
         MVC   V.MSG01_DESC,MSG11
         BAL   R1,LINE0000                    NEXT LINE
         B     EXIT0000
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*        Next line on display                                         *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
LINE0000 DS    0H
         LA    R3,PNS_L(,R3)
         A     R6,SPF_VWIDTH                  NEXT LINE
         BCT   R7,LINE0010                    MINUS 1 AVAILABLE LINE
         B     EXIT0000                       SCREEN FULL.. EXIT
LINE0010 DS    0H
         BR    R1
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
EXIT0000 DS    0H
         ITRACE ID=EXIT
         ST    R3,FIELD_EXIT_PNS
         ST    R6,FIELD_EXIT_VDATA
         STH   R7,FIELD_EXIT_LINES
         L     R13,4(,R13)                    RESTORE R13
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)                RESTORE REGISTERS
         SR    R15,R15
         BR    R14                            RETURN
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXD_START    DC     Q(DXDUCB)

UCBVOLI_DISP DC     AL2(UCBVOLI-UCBOB)
UCBVOLI_NAME DC     CL8'UCBVOLI'
UCBSTAB_DISP DC     AL2(UCBSTAB-UCBOB)
UCBSTAB_NAME DC     CL8'UCBSTAB'

MSG01        DS     0C
             DC     AL1($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_TURQUOISE)
MSG01_DISP   DC     CL04' '
             DC     AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH)
MSG01_NAME   DC     CL08' '
             DC     AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_NORMAL)
MSG01_DATA   DC     CL20' '
             DC     CL04' '
MSG01_ATTR   DC     AL01($SCREEN_ATTR_HIGH_GREEN)
MSG01_DESC   DC     CL40' '
MSG01_L      EQU    *-MSG01

MSG02        DC     CL40'VOLSER'
MSG03        DC     CL40'Volume status'
MSG04        DC     CL40'Not demountable'
MSG05        DC     CL40'Volume used for paging'
MSG06        DC     CL40'Permanently resident'
MSG07        DC     CL40'Private'
MSG08        DC     CL40'Public'
MSG09        DC     CL40'Storage'
MSG10        DC     CL40'Sharable amoung JOB steps'
MSG11        DC     CL40'Catalog on volume'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
DXDUCB       DSECT
             COPY     DXDPREF
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COMMON
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             SESSION  TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
UCB          DSECT
             IEFUCBOB LIST=YES
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             BPXYSTAT DSECT=YES,LIST=NO
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             STORCOMM
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     PNS
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             OSSPFD   TYPE=DSECT
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     TRENTRY
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     ATTRS
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
             COPY     REGEQU
             END      UCBEXIT

UCBTBL.text:
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
UCBTBL   CSECT
UCBTBL   AMODE 31
UCBTBL   RMODE ANY
         DC    CL8'UCB'                  CONTROL BLOCK NAME
         DC    CL40'Unit control block'
         DC    CL8'STORCB'               PANEL NAME
         FIELD BASE=UCBOB
         FIELD UCBJBNR,X,1,'Flags',                                    +
               BIT1=(UCBVRDEV,'VIO device'),                           +
               BIT2=(UCBJES3,'Managed by JES3'),                       +
               BIT3=(UCBDUC,'Display device unit check during IPL'),   +
               BIT4=(UCBJ3DV,'Device is defined to JES3'),             +
               BIT5=(UCBOLDSM,'OLTEP communicating with MSC'),         +
               BIT6=(UCBMMSGP,'Mount message pending'),                +
               BIT7=(UCBDCONS,'Control by disabled console support'),  +
               BIT8=(UCBMONT,'Data on volume retained or passed')
         FIELD UCBFL5,X,1,'Flags',                                     +
               BIT1=(UCBDCC,'Disconnect command chain device'),        +
               BIT2=(UCBAF,'ATTENTION processed by comm task'),        +
               BIT3=(UCBSMS,'SMS managed device'),                     +
               BIT4=(UCBVSDR,'Variable length SDRs'),                  +
               BIT5=(UCBENVRD,'Device returns environment data'),      +
               BIT6=(UCBNALOC,'OFFLINE, used by system component'),    +
               BIT7=(UCBALTCU,'Alternate control unit address'),       +
               BIT8=(UCBCUIR,'OFFLINE due to CUIR')
         FIELD UCBID,X,1,'UCB type',                                   +
               VALUE1=(255,'UCB'),                                     +
               VALUE2=(204,'UCB copy'),                                +
               VALUE3=(17,'Changed from static to dynamic'),           +
               VALUE4=(18,'Used exclusively by IOS'),                  +
               VALUE5=(253,'Used exclusively by IOS')
         FIELD UCBSTAT,X,1,'Device status',                            +
               BIT1=(UCBONLI,'Online'),                                +
               BIT2=(UCBCHGS,'Change to OFFLINE when deallocated'),    +
               BIT3=(UCBRESV,'Volume is reserved'),                    +
               BIT4=(UCBUNLD,'Unload issued to operator'),             +
               BIT5=(UCBALOC,'Allocated'),                             +
               BIT6=(UCBPRES,'Volume is permanently resident'),        +
               BIT7=(UCBSYSR,'SYSRES or active console'),              +
               BIT8=(UCBDADI,'Labels verified or secondary console')
         FIELD UCBCHAN,X,2,'Binary device number'
         FIELD UCBFLA,X,1,'Status flags',                              +
               BIT1=(UCBDEFER,'Temporarily unusable'),                 +
               BIT2=(UCBNRY,'Not ready'),                              +
               BIT3=(UCBPERM,'Subchannel for device is unusable'),     +
               BIT4=(UCBPSNS,'Pending SENSE'),                         +
               BIT5=(UCBSTRT,'Start subchannel issued'),               +
               BIT6=(UCBHALT,'Halt subchannel issued'),                +
               BIT7=(UCBCLEAR,'Clear subchannel issued'),              +
               BIT8=(UCBBOX,'Forced offline due to error')
         FIELD UCBFLB,X,1,'Status flags',                              +
               BIT1=(UCBINCPT,'Intercept requiring ERP'),              +
               BIT2=(UCBNOPTH,'No operational paths'),                 +
               BIT3=(UCBNOCON,'Not connected to a subchannel'),        +
               BIT4=(UCBHILVL,'Non-normal UCBLEVEL'),                  +
               BIT5=(UCBHDET,'Hot I/O detected'),                      +
               BIT6=(UCBIOSN,'Waiting for I/O synchronization')
         FIELD UCBWGT,X,1,'Flags',                                     +
               BIT1=(UCBIN,'SYSIN'),                                   +
               BIT2=(UCBOUT,'SYSOUT'),                                 +
               BIT3=(UCBPUB,'Allocated for a PUBLIC volume'),          +
               BIT4=(UCBREW,'REWIND issued'),                          +
               BIT5=(UCBMTPXP,'Parallel access volume')
         FIELD UCBNAME,C,3,'Device number'
         FIELD UCBTBYT1,X,1,'Model bits'
         FIELD UCBTBYT2,X,1,'Option flags'
         FIELD UCBTBYT3,X,1,'Class',                                   +
               VALUE1=(128,'Tape'),                                    +
               VALUE2=(64,'Communications'),                           +
               VALUE3=(65,'CTC adapter'),                              +
               VALUE4=(32,'Direct access'),                            +
               VALUE5=(16,'Display'),                                  +
               VALUE6=(8,'Unit record'),                               +
               VALUE7=(4,'Character reader')
         FIELD UCBTBYT4,X,1,'Device code'
         FIELD UCBFLC,X,1,'Supervisor flags',                          +
               BIT1=(UCBATTP,'Attention pending'),                     +
               BIT2=(UCBITFP,'Intercept pending'),                     +
               BIT3=(UCBUDE,'Unsolicited device end'),                 +
               BIT4=(UCBIVRS,'Intervention required message issued'),  +
               BIT5=(UCBIVRR,'Intervention required message needed'),  +
               BIT6=(UCBDDRSW,'DDR switch pending')
         FIELD UCBEXTP,X,3,'Address of extension',                     +
               EXIT=UCBEXIT
         DC    X'FF'
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     FIELDD
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         IEFUCBOB LIST=YES
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
*                                                                     *
* ------------------------------------------------------------------- *
         COPY     REGEQU
         END      UCBTBL
